profileInfos.name: Starknet
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Starknet is a Layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum, using ZK-rollups to enhance scalability and reduce transaction costs while maintaining security and decentralization.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Starknet is a Layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum that uses STARK proofs to validate transactions off-chain while maintaining security. It features native account abstraction, parallel transaction execution, and Cairo programming language for smart contracts. It enables developers to build complex applications with better user experience and lower costs while inheriting Ethereum's security guarantees.
profileInfos.tagLine: Shaping the future with scale and integrity

products.name: Starknet
products.description: Starknet is a layer-2 scaling solution built on Ethereum that uses STARK proofs, a zero-knowledge rollup technology, to validate transactions off-chain.

products.name: Starkgate
products.description: Starkgate is the official bridge for transferring assets between Ethereum and Starknet networks using STARK proofs for secure cross-chain transactions.

products.name: SNF Faucet
products.description: SNF Faucet is a Starknet Faucet tool that allows developers to request test ETH for their Starknet accounts on the Sepolia testnet.

assets.name: STRK
assets.description: STRK is Starknet's native token used for transaction fees, staking, and governance of the Layer 2 network.

profileInfos.name: Argent
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Self-custody smart wallet for managing digital assets on Starknet with built-in trading and security features.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Argent is a cryptocurrency wallet that helps users manage their digital assets on Starknet. Users can buy, swap, and stake tokens without seed phrases. The wallet includes portfolio tracking, security monitoring, and NFT support.
profileInfos.tagLine: Smart wallets for smart people

products.name: Argent Mobile
products.description: Argent Mobile is a self-custodial smart wallet that helps users manage tokens on Starknet. Users can pay fees in any token, batch transactions together, and safely connect to dapps, trade assets, manage NFTs, and protect their funds with built-in security tools like 2FA and automated monitoring. Users can also buy crypto with Apple Pay and earn yields through integrated protocols.

products.name: Argent X
products.description: Argent X is a self-custodial open-source wallet browser extension wallet for Starknet featuring native account abstraction, enabling users to create, manage, and connect accounts to StarkNet dApps, supports smart contract interactions, and includes portfolio management capabilities.

products.name: Argent Web Wallet SDK
products.description: Argent Web Wallet SDK lets developers add StarkNet wallets to their apps with just email sign-in. Users get a secure, self-custodial wallet without seed phrases or downloads. Features include customizable gas fees, session keys for smooth dapp connections, and optional transaction fee coverage through paymasters.

products.name: Portfolio
products.description: Portfolio is an analytics dashboard for monitoring & managing Starknet wallet activity and DeFi positions. It provides token balance tracking, DeFi position management, position rebalancing tools, and airdrop monitoring. Users can track multiple wallets, analyze protocol interactions, and view NFT holdings through a unified interface.

profileInfos.name: Braavos
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Self-custodial wallet for Starknet providing biometric security and DeFi integration capabilities
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Braavos is a non-custodial wallet for the Starknet ecosystem that combines advanced security features with DeFi functionality. The wallet offers biometric 2FA/3FA protection, hardware wallet integration, and built-in DeFi capabilities.
profileInfos.tagLine: The most advanced wallet on Starknet

products.name: Braavos Wallet
products.description: Braavos Wallet helps you securely manage digital assets on Starknet using biometric protection. You can trade tokens, track investments, and use DeFi apps through a simple dashboard. The wallet makes blockchain interactions safer with multifactor security while letting you easily buy crypto using regular payment methods.

profileInfos.name: Keplr
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Non-custodial multichain wallet connecting users to blockchain applications and decentralized web experiences.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Keplr provides a wallet solution for managing digital assets and blockchain interactions. Users can access multiple networks through browser extension and mobile apps, connect to decentralized applications, and manage their crypto portfolio. It supports Cosmos SDK chains, EVM chains, and Starknet.
profileInfos.tagLine: Your Multichain Gateway

products.name: Keplr Extension
products.description: Keplr Extension is a multichain cryptocurrency wallet that operates as a browser extension that enables users to manage assets, track activities, and perform IBC transfers.

products.name: Keplr Mobile
products.description: Keplr Mobile is a mobile cryptocurrency wallet that enables users to manage digital assets, perform transactions, stake tokens, and participate in governance.

products.name: Keplr Multisig
products.description: Keplr Multisig is a collaborative wallet management tool that enables teams and DAOs to securely control shared accounts through multi-signature authorization and transaction tracking.

products.name: Keplr Validator Dashboard
products.description: Keplr Validator Dashboard is a specialized dashboard for blockchain validators to manage operations, streamline voting, handle commission claims, and engage with delegator communities.

profileInfos.name: Layerswap
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Layerswap helps users transfer digital assets between exchanges and blockchain networks through direct exchange integrations.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Layerswap helps traders and developers move digital assets between centralized exchanges and blockchain networks through integrated exchange connections. Users can deposit funds from exchanges to Layer 2 networks, transfer assets between different blockchains, and connect through fiat on-ramps. Layerswap processes transactions using optimized routes across supported networks.
profileInfos.tagLine: Fast and reliable crypto transfers. Freedom to move crypto anywhere.

products.name: Layerswap Bridge
products.description: Layerswap Bridge facilitates direct transfers between centralized exchanges and blockchain networks through an aggregated bridge interface. The platform connects multiple exchanges, Layer 2 networks, and blockchain protocols to enable efficient asset transfers with integrated fiat support.

profileInfos.name: STRKFarm
profileInfos.descriptionShort: STRKFarm helps users maximize yields by automatically managing assets across DeFi protocols on Starknet.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: STRKFarm helps users maximize yields through automated vaults that reallocate assets across DeFi protocols on Starknet. Users can deposit assets into vaults that optimize yield farming strategies, track pool performance, and manage their positions with a user-friendly interface. The platform integrates with multiple protocols and supports over 50 pools to provide optimized returns while minimizing risk through automated management.
profileInfos.tagLine: Starknetâ€™s Yield Powerhouse.

products.name: STRKFarm
products.description: STRKFarm Platform helps users earn optimized yields by automatically managing assets across multiple DeFi protocols on Starknet. The platform monitors over 50 pools, executes automated farming strategies, and provides real-time performance tracking.

profileInfos.name: Vesu
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Vesu lets users supply and borrow crypto assets through a permissionless lending protocol on Starknet without intermediaries or governance.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Vesu lets users supply assets, borrow against collateral, and create lending markets on Starknet. Users can deploy custom lending logic through programmable hooks and earn yield with ERC-4626 compliant vTokens. Each lending pool operates independently with its own risk parameters. The protocol has no governance system, relying on market forces for capital allocation.
profileInfos.tagLine: Earn, borrow, create markets. Modular & permissionless lending on Starknet.

products.name: Vesu Protocol
products.description: Vesu Protocol supports lending and borrowing of crypto assets on Starknet through isolated lending pools. Users supply collateral to borrow assets, with positions managed through smart contracts. Each pool maintains separate risk parameters and integrates with Pragma oracles for price feeds. Developers can create custom lending markets using programmable hooks.

profileInfos.name: Nostra
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Nostra provides lending, borrowing, swapping, and bridging services for cryptocurrencies on the Starknet network.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Nostra provides a unified application for cryptocurrency transactions on Starknet. Users can lend and borrow digital assets through Nostra Lend, exchange tokens via Nostra Pools, and transfer assets across different blockchains. The protocol supports multiple assets including ETH, USDC, DAI, and STRK, with governance managed through the NSTR token.
profileInfos.tagLine: The Crypto Super App. Lend, borrow, swap and bridge your crypto in one place.

products.name: Nostra Money Market
products.description: Nostra Money Market enables lending and borrowing of digital assets on Starknet through tokenized positions. The protocol uses risk tiers, efficiency modes, and dynamic interest rates to manage lending operations. Users can supply assets to earn interest or borrow against collateral with automated liquidation protection.

products.name: Nostra Pools
products.description: Nostra Pools provides automated market making on Starknet with multiple pool types: Verified, Experimental, Volatile, Stable, and Degen. The protocol enables liquidity provision with customized risk levels and integrates with Nostra Money Market for enhanced yields.

products.name: Nostra Swap
products.description: Nostra Swap executes token exchanges on Starknet using Nostra Pools' liquidity. The protocol routes trades through optimal pools to provide efficient token swaps with minimized slippage.

products.name: Nostra Bridge
products.description: Nostra Bridge facilitates asset transfers between Starknet and external blockchain networks. The protocol ensures secure cross-chain transactions through verified bridge contracts.

assets.name: Nostra
assets.description: NSTR functions as the governance token for Nostra protocol, facilitating community voting and protocol management on Starknet and Ethereum networks.

assets.name: UNO
assets.description: UNO functions as an over-collateralized stablecoin on Starknet, utilizing Nostra Money Market's lending system for stability and integrating with protocol liquidity mechanisms.

profileInfos.name: Opus
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Opus provides autonomous credit facilities through dynamic interest rates and risk parameters on StarkNet.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Opus operates an autonomous credit protocol on StarkNet that enables borrowing against crypto portfolios including yield-bearing assets. The protocol adjusts interest rates and risk parameters dynamically based on market conditions. Users can borrow CASH stablecoin, provide liquidity to the stability pool, and participate in liquidations. The system uses autonomous controllers to maintain CASH's USD peg.
profileInfos.tagLine: The autonomous and dynamic synthetic issuance platform.

products.name: Opus Protocol
products.description: Opus Protocol implements autonomous credit facilities that enable borrowing against crypto portfolios through dynamic risk parameters. The system manages collateralized debt positions, handles liquidations through a stability pool, and maintains a USD-pegged stablecoin using algorithmic controllers.

assets.name: CASH
assets.description: CASH functions as an overcollateralized stablecoin on StarkNet, using autonomous interest rate adjustments to maintain its USD peg.

profileInfos.name: Carmine Finance
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Carmine Finance offers advanced crypto options for managing risk.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Carmine Finance aims to manage your crypto risk with advanced options. It offers services for traders and protocols by providing better crypto options. The platform is designed to support both traders and builders in effectively leveraging crypto trading options.
profileInfos.tagLine: Better Crypto Options for Traders & Protocols. Manage your crypto risk with advanced options.

products.name: Konoha
products.description: Konoha offers governance infrastructure for Starknet protocols, implementing token staking, vesting, and treasury management functions. The platform enables voting systems, proposal management, and token distribution through smart contracts.

products.name: DeRisk
products.description: DeRisk provides risk monitoring and protection tools for DeFi lending protocols on Starknet. The platform tracks loan positions, liquidation prices, and collateral metrics across protocols, enabling protection against bad debt through options-based insurance mechanisms.

products.name: Carmine Options
products.description: Carmine Options AMM facilitates decentralized options trading through an automated market maker design. The protocol enables users to both buy and sell European-style options with customizable strike prices and expiration dates. It integrates with price feeds for option pricing and uses smart contracts for trade execution.

assets.name: CRM Token
assets.description: CRM functions as the governance token for Carmine Finance, enabling protocol governance through voting and treasury management. Token holders can participate in protocol decisions and fee distribution.

profileInfos.name: StarkRevoke
profileInfos.descriptionShort: StarkRevoke helps users manage and revoke token approvals on StarkNet by providing an interface to view and cancel permissions.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: StarkRevoke is a decentralized application designed to enhance wallet security within the Starknet ecosystem by allowing users to manage and revoke token and NFT allowances granted to smart contracts. Inspired by tools like Revoke.cash, StarkRevoke empowers users to mitigate risks associated with unauthorized or malicious contract interactions. By providing a straightforward interface for reviewing and rescinding permissions, it helps users maintain control over their assets and reduce exposure to potential vulnerabilities in the Web3 ecosystem.
profileInfos.tagLine: Easy Approvals, Selective Control, Enhanced Security - Your Revocation Revolution!

products.name: StarkRevoke
products.description: StarkRevoke implements approval management for StarkNet tokens, enabling users to view and revoke permissions granted to smart contracts for both ERC20 and ERC721 tokens.

profileInfos.name: Walnut
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Walnut provides transaction debugging and simulation tools for Starknet smart contract developers.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Walnut offers a web-based debugger for Starknet transactions that allows developers to inspect variable states, monitor errors, and simulate transactions before deployment. The platform includes contract verification and gas profiling for Starknet and appchain development.
profileInfos.tagLine: Debug Transactions on Starknet

products.name: Walnut Debugger
products.description: A web-based debugger for Starknet smart contracts that processes transaction execution details, simulates deployments, and verifies contract code.

profileInfos.name: Viewblock
profileInfos.descriptionShort: ViewBlock provides blockchain data access and analysis tools for multiple networks including Thorchain, Arweave, and Starknet.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: ViewBlock provides blockchain data access and analysis tools for multiple networks. The platform displays transaction details, wallet activities, and network statistics for Thorchain, Arweave, Ao, KYVE, Zilliqa, and Starknet. Users can track on-chain data, verify transactions, and monitor network metrics through standardized interfaces for each supported blockchain.
profileInfos.tagLine: Blockchain exploration for the masses.

products.name: ViewBlock Explorer
products.description: ViewBlock Explorer displays blockchain data from multiple networks in a standardized format. The platform shows transaction details, wallet activities, smart contracts, and network metrics. Users can search, filter, and analyze on-chain data across supported networks including Thorchain, Arweave, and Starknet.

profileInfos.name: StarkNet Social
profileInfos.descriptionShort: StarkNet Social enables decentralized social networking on StarkNet through profile verification and trust scoring systems.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: StarkNet Social provides a decentralized social networking protocol on the StarkNet Layer 2 network. The protocol implements profile verification, trust scoring, and community interaction features. Users can create verified profiles, engage with content, and build reputation through the trust score system. The protocol operates on StarkNet's infrastructure to offer secure and scalable social networking capabilities.
profileInfos.tagLine: Claim your Social Space

products.name: StarkNet Social Protocol
products.description: StarkNet Social Protocol implements decentralized social networking features using Cairo smart contracts on StarkNet. The protocol processes user interactions, manages profile verification, and maintains trust scores through its smart contract system. It connects to StarkNet-compatible wallets for user authentication and transaction signing. The protocol includes components for profile management, content interaction, and reputation tracking.

profileInfos.name: Voyager Starknet Explorer
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Voyager provides blockchain data tools for Starknet including block exploration, RPC infrastructure, and staking interfaces.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Voyager serves as the primary block explorer and data infrastructure suite for the Starknet network. The platform includes tools for transaction tracking, smart contract verification, network analytics, RPC access, and STRK token staking. Voyager enables users and developers to interact with and analyze Starknet blockchain data.
profileInfos.tagLine: If it happens onchain, Voyager knows about it.

products.name: Voyager Block Explorer
products.description: Voyager Block Explorer for Starknet offers transaction tracking, contract verification, network analytics, and RPC services with real-time data visualization and comprehensive search capabilities.

products.name: Voyager RPC
products.description: Voyager RPC is a service for accessing Starknet blockchain data that provides mainnet and testnet endpoints, processes network requests, and enables direct chain interaction. Features includes load balancing, network monitoring, and standard RPC methods for retrieving blockchain information.

products.name: Voyager Staking Dashboard
products.description: Voyager Staking Dashboard is a management interface for Starknet staking operations. It tracks validator information, displays staking metrics, and processes staking transactions. User can connect their wallets for viewing stake positions and manage validator participation.

profileInfos.name: Endur
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Endur provides liquid staking for STRK tokens on Starknet through xSTRK, allowing users to earn staking rewards while maintaining asset liquidity.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Endur operates a liquid staking protocol on Starknet that converts STRK tokens into xSTRK tokens. Users can stake STRK to receive xSTRK, which generates staking rewards while remaining tradeable. The protocol implements a performance fee structure on rewards while maintaining zero fees for staking and redemption operations. xSTRK functions across DeFi applications, supporting lending, trading, and yield strategies on Starknet.
profileInfos.tagLine: Convert your STRK into xSTRK to earn staking rewards and participate in DeFi opportunities across the Starknet ecosystem.

products.name: Endur
products.description: Endur Liquid Staking Protocol implements a staking system for STRK tokens on Starknet. The protocol mints xSTRK tokens to represent staked positions, enabling users to maintain liquidity while earning staking rewards. The system processes stake and redemption requests without fees, applying a performance fee only to generated rewards. The protocol integrates with DeFi applications to support lending, trading, and yield strategies.

assets.name: xSTRK
assets.description: xSTRK functions as a liquid staking token on Starknet, representing staked STRK tokens. The token accrues staking rewards while maintaining transferability and DeFi compatibility.

profileInfos.name: Cairo
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Cairo implements a programming language for creating STARK-provable programs and smart contracts on Starknet.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Cairo provides a programming language for developing STARK-provable programs and smart contracts. The language supports general computation and smart contract development on Starknet, a Layer 2 blockchain. Cairo offers Rust-like syntax, built-in testing capabilities, and tools for generating validity proofs. The language enables developers to build scalable applications without requiring deep zero-knowledge proof expertise.
profileInfos.tagLine: The Rust-inspired language that makes it easy to build scalable dApps with the power of validity proofs.

products.name: Cairo Programming Language
products.description: Cairo Programming Language provides a way to write programs that can prove their computations are correct without revealing the actual data. It uses Rust-like syntax to help developers create smart contracts for Starknet and build applications that need mathematical proofs of correctness. The language includes tools for testing, debugging, and generating proofs, making it simpler for developers to build trustworthy blockchain applications without deep cryptography knowledge.

profileInfos.name: AVNU
profileInfos.descriptionShort: AVNU lets users trade tokens on Starknet with automated strategies and flexible gas payments.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: AVNU is a decentralized exchange protocol combining token trading, automated investment tools, and gas payment options on Starknet. Users can execute trades, set up recurring purchases, and access market data through the exchange interface. Developers can integrate AVNU's tools to handle gas fees in any token or sponsor user transactions on their applications.
profileInfos.tagLine: The best trading experience on Starknet

products.name: AVNU Spot
products.description: AVNU Spot provides optimized token swaps on Starknet with smart routing and advanced features like Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA). The platform aggregates liquidity sources and provides tools for both spot trading and automated investment strategies.

products.name: AVNU Paymaster
products.description: AVNU Paymaster enables gas fee abstraction on Starknet, allowing applications to sponsor transaction fees or accept any token for gas payments. The service simplifies user experience by removing the need to hold native tokens for transaction fees.

products.name: AVNU Staking
products.description: AVNU Staking is a Starknet staking service for delegating STRK tokens. Users can stake tokens through AVNU's validator pool without fees, claim rewards at any time, and withdraw funds after a 21-day period.

profileInfos.name: Starknet ID
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Digital identity and domain name services for the Starknet ecosystem, enabling users to create and manage digital identities with .stark domains.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Starknet ID is a decentralized identity protocol for Starknet users and applications. It combines domain name registration (.stark domains) with identity verification features, allowing users to link wallet addresses, social accounts, and other digital credentials to a single identity. The system enables human-readable names for transactions and integrates with major Starknet applications.
profileInfos.tagLine: Your Starknet Passport

products.name: Starknet.id
products.description: Starknet.id is an identity and domain name protocol that enables users to create unique identifiers on Starknet, register .stark domains, and manage digital credentials. The system provides APIs for applications to integrate identity verification and human-readable addresses.

profileInfos.name: zkLend
profileInfos.descriptionShort: zkLend provides decentralized lending and borrowing on Starknet, enabling users to earn yields and access loans using their digital assets.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: zkLend is a Layer 2 money-market protocol on Starknet that allows users to lend and borrow digital assets. The protocol features a DeFi platform for retail users and an institutional service with KYC requirements. Users can supply assets to earn yields, use deposits as collateral for borrowing, and participate in protocol governance through the ZEND token.
profileInfos.tagLine: L2 money-market protocol built on Starknet

products.name: zkLend DeFi
products.description: zkLend is a decentralized lending protocol on Starknet enabling users to deposit assets as collateral, borrow supported tokens, and earn yields on supplied assets.

products.name: zkLend Institutional
products.description: zkLend Institutional is an institutional lending service offering under-collateralized loans with KYC requirements, customizable loan terms, and compliant access to DeFi markets.

assets.name: ZEND
assets.description: The native utility and governance token of the zkLend protocol, used for protocol governance and reward distribution.

profileInfos.name: Hashstack
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Hashstack provides under-collateralized loans on Starknet, allowing users to borrow up to 500% of their collateral for trading and liquidity provision
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Hashstack provides under-collateralized lending on Starknet, allowing users to borrow up to 500% of their collateral value. The protocol uses HSTK tokens for governance, fee payments, and liquidator roles. It maintains user funds in smart contracts while borrowers can deploy capital for trading and liquidity provision.
profileInfos.tagLine: Under-collateralised loans

products.name: Hashstack Open
products.description: Hashstack Open enables permissionless under-collateralized lending on Starknet. Users can borrow up to 500% of their collateral and utilize loans directly for trading on integrated DEXes.

assets.name: Hashstack
assets.description: HSTK is Hashstack's utility token, which enables governance, fee payments, and liquidator roles in the protocol's under-collateralized lending system.

profileInfos.name: DEX Screener
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Monitor DEX trading activity and analyze market data across blockchain networks with customizable charts, price alerts, and trading tools.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: DEX Screener indexes blockchain data to provide trading analytics for decentralized exchanges. Users track token prices, analyze market conditions, monitor liquidity, and receive alerts. Traders can create watchlists, compare assets using multicharts, and connect to supported DEXs for trade execution. All data comes directly from blockchain nodes through custom indexing infrastructure.
profileInfos.tagLine: Realtime DEX analytics

products.name: DEX Screener
products.description: A trading analytics service that indexes and displays DEX market data, offering price tracking, technical analysis tools, and trade execution through supported exchanges.

profileInfos.name: Kraken
profileInfos.descriptionShort: US-based cryptocurrency exchange offering trading, staking, and self-custodial wallet services.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Kraken is a cryptocurrency exchange and financial services platform. It provides a range of services including cryptocurrency trading, staking, and a self-custodial wallet. Kraken is known for its strong focus on security, regulatory compliance, and user privacy. The platform supports multiple blockchains and offers institutional-grade custody solutions.
profileInfos.tagLine: Kraken is your bridge to the world of crypto.

products.name: Kraken Exchange
products.description: Secure platform for buying, selling, and trading cryptocurrencies with advanced features for all user levels.

products.name: Kraken Wallet
products.description: Multi-chain self-custodial wallet for managing cryptocurrencies, NFTs, and interacting with DeFi applications.

products.name: Kraken Custody
products.description: Institutional-grade custody platform for secure storage of digital assets.

profileInfos.name: Paradex
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Paradex is a decentralized exchange offering perpetual futures trading with low fees, high capital efficiency, and self-custodial control.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Paradex is a decentralized exchange built on a StarkNet Appchain, enabling perpetual futures trading with low fees and high capital efficiency. It uses zk-STARKs for scalability and security, ensuring fast transaction finality while maintaining decentralization. Paradex supports Ethereum-compatible wallets for seamless integration and offers advanced tools like Vault Traded Funds (VTFs) to enhance user experience. The platform prioritizes trustless trading and user control.
profileInfos.tagLine: High-Performance Decentralized Exchange

products.name: Paradex Perpetual Futures Exchange
products.description: Paradex Perpetual Futures Exchange enables users to trade perpetual contracts on a decentralized Layer 2 blockchain. It leverages zk-STARK technology for secure, scalable transactions and supports Ethereum-compatible wallets for easy access. Users benefit from low fees, fast execution, and tools like Vault Traded Funds (VTFs) for advanced trading strategies. Paradex ensures trustless trading while maintaining user ownership of funds and private keys.

products.name: Paradex Mobile App
products.description: Paradex Mobile App provides mobile access to Paradex's DEX, enabling futures and options trading with advanced order types from a single unified account.

assets.name: DIME
assets.description: DIME is the native token of Paradex Chain, used to pay transaction fees and support decentralized operations on its Layer 2 network powered by zk-STARK technology.

profileInfos.name: Jediswap
profileInfos.descriptionShort: JediSwap lets users swap digital assets and provide liquidity on Starknet with low fees and fast settlement.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: JediSwap is a decentralized exchange on Starknet where users can trade tokens or provide liquidity to earn fees. The protocol uses automated market makers to determine prices and execute trades without order books.
profileInfos.tagLine: 100% community-led, fully permissionless, and composable AMM on Starknet

products.name: JediSwap
products.description: JediSwap implements concentrated liquidity with customizable price ranges for capital efficiency. The system includes multiple fee tier options and smart routing for optimal trade execution across pools.

profileInfos.name: 10K X
profileInfos.descriptionShort: 10K is a decentralized exchange platform for Ethereum L2 networks, enabling token trading and perpetual contracts with reduced fees.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: 10K develops trading platforms operating on multiple Ethereum L2 networks. The project includes 10K Swap for token exchange on Starknet, 10K DEX for spot and perpetual trading with leverage options, and 10K Wallet Mobile for account abstraction features. The platforms utilize multi-asset liquidity pools where providers receive tokens representing their share and earn trading fees. The ecosystem focuses on providing centralized exchange-like experiences within a decentralized framework.
profileInfos.tagLine: Your portal to Ethereum Future

products.name: 10K Swap
products.description: 10K Swap is an AMM protocol built on Starknet, providing users with token trading capabilities with lower fees and higher liquidity. Users can also contribute to liquidity pools and earn fees from trading activity.

products.name: 10K DEX
products.description: 10K DEX is a decentralized spot and perpetual exchange on multiple L2 networks, supported by a multi-asset pool architecture. The platform processes both market and limit orders for spot and leveraged trading, utilizing price feeds aggregated from major exchanges for accurate valuation.

products.name: 10K Data
products.description: 10K Data is a data terminal for Ethereum Layer 2 networks, displaying on-chain metrics and protocol statistics. The platform tracks project performance and market movements across zkSync Era, Starknet, and Scroll ecosystems to help users monitor investment trends and market activity.

products.name: 10K Wallet Mobile
products.description: 10K Wallet implements an EIP-4337 mobile wallet interface for Ethereum networks, enabling account abstraction features through smart contracts. The application processes multiple signature types and supports batch transfers, gas-free payments, and asset management within a unified interface.

profileInfos.name: Bountive
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Bountive is a decentralized prize savings protocol on Starknet that lets users deposit assets for yield generation without the risk of principal loss.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Bountive is a decentralized, no-loss prize savings protocol on Starknet that combines savings security with prize opportunities. Users deposit funds that earn yield through DeFi platforms, and this yield is distributed as prizes through a transparent selection process, all without risk to the initial deposit.
profileInfos.tagLine: No-Loss Prize Savings Protocol

products.name: Bountive Protocol
products.description: Bountive Protocol enables users to deposit crypto assets on Starknet that generate yield, which is distributed as prizes through a verifiable random selection process while maintaining no risk to principal.

profileInfos.name: Banxa
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Banxa provides payment infrastructure for digital asset platforms, enabling fiat-to-crypto transactions through global payment methods.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Banxa provides payment infrastructure for digital asset platforms, connecting traditional finance with blockchain networks. It offers fiat-to-crypto on-ramp and off-ramp services with regulatory compliance across global markets. The platform supports multiple payment methods, cryptocurrencies, and blockchains, with additional services for NFT purchases and streamlined KYC processes. Banxa aims to make cryptocurrency accessible through a secure transaction flow for both purchasing and selling digital assets
profileInfos.tagLine: Powering embedded crypto solutions

products.name: Banxa Checkout
products.description: Banxa Checkout enables users to buy and sell cryptocurrencies using fiat payment methods with integrated regulatory compliance across multiple blockchain networks.

products.name: Banxa APIs
products.description: Banxa APIs provide REST endpoints for order creation, price quotes, payment methods, KYC sharing, and currency support, enabling partners to build custom cryptocurrency exchange interfaces with streamlined verification.

profileInfos.name: Ekubo
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Ekubo Protocol enables trading digital assets on Starknet through an automated market maker with concentrated liquidity, low fees, and extensibility.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Ekubo Protocol enables capital-efficient trading through concentrated liquidity positions, extensibility for custom order types, and optimized gas fees on Starknet. The protocol charges a withdrawal fee on positions equal to the swap fee, which is directed to the Ekubo DAO for governance through EKUBO token holders.
profileInfos.tagLine: The most powerful AMM ever

products.name: Ekubo Protocol
products.description: Ekubo Protocol is an automated market maker (AMM protocol) on Starknet using concentrated liquidity to provide efficient trading of digital assets.

assets.name: EKUBO
assets.description: EKUBO functions as the governance token for the Ekubo Protocol, enabling proposal creation and voting on protocol changes. Token holders can stake EKUBO to participate in DAO governance.

profileInfos.name: Haiko
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Haiko offers automated market-making on Starknet with dynamic position management for liquidity providers.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Haiko creates automated market-making on Starknet, where liquidity positions adjust automatically based on preset conditions. The protocol includes programmable positions with smart contract logic for position management, concentrated liquidity pools for better capital efficiency, and limit orders for specific price execution. Haiko reduces liquidity provision complexity through vaults that automate position updates, lower gas fees through shared costs, and add risk management tools such as impermanent loss caps for users on Starknet.
profileInfos.tagLine: The smartest way to provide liquidity

products.name: Haiko AMM
products.description: Haiko AMM creates a concentrated liquidity automated market maker on Starknet using a hooks-based design for various position types. Users place static positions in fixed price ranges, dynamic positions that update before swaps, and limit orders that execute at target prices.

products.name: Haiko Vaults
products.description: Haiko Vaults manages liquidity for providers by placing and updating positions in the AMM as markets move. It includes Strategy Vaults (V1) for standard automation and Solvers (V2) for free position updates with impermanent loss protection. The company uses on-chain smart contract logic to automate liquidity actions such as rebalancing across price ranges.

profileInfos.name: Fibrous
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Fibrous is a DEX aggregator that finds the best token prices on Starknet & Scroll by routing trades through multiple liquidity sources.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Fibrous aggregates and routes token swaps across multiple DEXs on Starknet and Scroll to provide optimal pricing. The platform scans available liquidity sources, calculates the best execution path, and splits trades to reduce slippage. Fibrous offers standard swaps, batch swaps for multiple tokens in one transaction, and limit orders for price-targeted trades. Users maintain ownership of their assets until trade execution.
profileInfos.tagLine: Best Rates, One Place

products.name: Fibrous
products.description: Fibrous combines liquidity from multiple decentralized exchanges on Starknet and Scroll to optimize swap pricing. Features include single token swaps, batch swaps for multiple tokens, and limit orders for price-targeted execution. The interface displays real-time price comparisons across integrated DEXs and processes transactions with minimal fees.

profileInfos.name: Cairo Security Clan
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Cairo Security Clan provides security audits and research services for projects in the Starknet ecosystem.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Cairo Security Clan conducts security audits for Starknet projects. The team analyzes Cairo smart contracts to identify potential vulnerabilities and provides detailed reports. The audit process includes initial analysis, planning, parallel review teams, and a final report. Cairo Security Clan serves major Starknet protocols and focuses on protecting users and assets.
profileInfos.tagLine: Most talented Cairo auditors united to secure the Starknet ecosystem

products.name: Cairo Security Audit Service
products.description: Cairo Security Clan provides comprehensive security audits for Cairo and Starknet projects. The service includes code review, vulnerability identification, and detailed reports.

profileInfos.name: NFTScan
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Multi-chain NFT data infrastructure providing comprehensive analytics, explorer services, and API solutions for Web3 developers and users.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: NFTScan delivers professional NFT data services across multiple blockchains, offering NFT exploration, analytics, portfolio management, and infrastructure solutions. Their platform includes marketplace data, NFTFi insights, and collection tracking tools.
profileInfos.tagLine: The Largest NFT Data Infrastructure

products.name: NFTScan Explorer
products.description: Multi-chain NFT explorer providing comprehensive data indexing and analytics for Web3 developers and users across major blockchain networks.

products.name: NFTScan Developer Platform
products.description: Multi-chain NFT API platform providing comprehensive data services for developers, supporting over 1000+ Web3 projects with NFT indexing and analytics capabilities.

products.name: NFTScan Site
products.description: Project management platform for NFT collections, marketplaces, and NFTFi projects, offering customizable displays and analytics dashboards.

products.name: NFTScan as a Service (NaaS)
products.description: Custom NFT infrastructure development service for blockchain networks, providing professional NFT API data services and explorer products.

profileInfos.name: NUMS
profileInfos.descriptionShort: NUMS is a number sorting game on Starknet allowing players to earn tokens.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: NUMS is an on-chain game developed by Cartridge GG, built on Starknet's layer-3 app-chain using the SN Stack. Players sort numbers to earn tokens.
profileInfos.tagLine: Your trusted partner in numerical arrangement

products.name: NUMS
products.description: NUMS is a play-to-earn game on Starknet where players sort 20 random numbers (1-1000) in ascending order against the clock. Built on an L3 app-chain using the SN Stack by Cartridge GG, it rewards successful players with $nums tokens. The game combines simple mechanics with blockchain integration, offering both entertainment and financial incentives through Starknet's scalable infrastructure. Currently in early development, NUMS has completed initial sorting trials and is preparing for Phase 2 with expanded features.

assets.name: NUMS
assets.description: NUMS is the native reward token for the NUMS sorting game on Starknet. Players earn tokens by successfully completing timed number-sorting challenges. The token operates on Starknet's L2 infrastructure with transactions managed through the game's L3 app-chain for optimal efficiency.

profileInfos.name: Equilibrium
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Equilibrium helps solve the hardest engineering problems in Web3 through research and development of privacy, security, and scaling solutions.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Equilibrium is an R&D organization that designs, builds, and invests in core infrastructure for the decentralized web. They focus on complex engineering problems around security, privacy, and scaling. Apart from internal experimentation, they partner with ambitious founders to provide R&D support, engineering expertise, and funding through their venture arm.
profileInfos.tagLine: We design, build and invest in core infrastructure for the decentralized web

products.name: Pathfinder
products.description: Pathfinder is a Starknet full node implementation giving users access to the full Starknet state history, including contract code, storage, and transactions.

profileInfos.name: Starknet Scaffold
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Starknet Scaffold provides developers with tools to build decentralized applications on Starknet using a comprehensive toolkit of components and libraries.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Starknet Scaffold helps developers build decentralized applications on Starknet by providing ready-to-use components and scripts. It includes NextJS, Starknet.js, Starknet-React, Starknetkit, and Typescript for frontend development, along with Scarb and Starknet Foundry for smart contract development.
profileInfos.tagLine: Everything you need to buidl dApps on Starknet

products.name: Starknet Scaffold
products.description: Starknet Scaffold Toolkit provides components and utilities for developing dApps on Starknet, offering features like burner wallets, faucet integration, contract deployment tools, and learning resources.

profileInfos.name: Starkscan
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Starkscan provides blockchain data access through a block explorer and API service for the Starknet Layer 2 network.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Starkscan helps users explore the Starknet blockchain by indexing on-chain data and making it accessible through a block explorer and API. Users can search transactions, blocks, and smart contracts, access verified contract information, and use the API to build applications that require Starknet data. The platform supports both mainnet and testnet environments, offers NFT tracking, and includes contract verification tools for developers building on Starknet.
profileInfos.tagLine: Next-generation Starknet Block Explorer

products.name: Starkscan Block Explorer
products.description: Starkscan Block Explorer displays Starknet blockchain data including blocks, transactions, and smart contracts. Users can search by address, transaction hash, or block number to view transaction history, wallet balances, and contract interactions. The explorer decodes verified contract information for improved readability and offers NFT tracking capabilities.

products.name: Starkscan API
products.description: Starkscan API delivers programmatic access to Starknet blockchain data through REST endpoints. Developers can query information about blocks, transactions, contracts, and events with pagination support. The API includes specialized endpoints for NFT data and advanced analytics in the PRO tier.

profileInfos.name: Zohal
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Zohal provides decentralized perpetual trading on Starknet with low fees and secure liquidations.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Zohal is a decentralized perpetual exchange built on Starknet that enables users to trade with leverage while benefiting from low transaction costs. The platform offers advanced order types, dynamic funding rates, and secure liquidations using multi-source price feeds.
profileInfos.tagLine: Decentralized Perpetual Exchange

products.name: Zohal Exchange
products.description: A decentralized perpetual trading platform on Starknet offering leveraged trading up to 25x with advanced order types and secure liquidations.

profileInfos.name: zKorp
profileInfos.descriptionShort: zKorp creates on-chain games on Starknet using the Dojo engine.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: zKorp is a cooperative game studio that develops on-chain games and applications on Starknet using the Dojo engine. The team has created multiple games including zKnight, zDefender, and zKlash.
profileInfos.tagLine: Onchain game studio deploying games on Starknet

products.name: zKnight
products.description: An Into-The-Breach-like on-chain game based on Dojo engine that operates on Starknet.

products.name: zDefender
products.description: A tower defense game based on Dojo engine that runs on Starknet.

products.name: zKlash
products.description: An autobattler game implemented using Unity that interfaces with Starknet.

products.name: zConqueror
products.description: A risk-like on-chain strategy game based on Dojo engine on Starknet.

products.name: zIdle
products.description: An idle game playable with AI agents running on Starknet.

products.name: zKube
products.description: A casual mobile friendly puzzle game on Starknet.

products.name: zKastle
products.description: A card game running on Starknet.

profileInfos.name: XAR
profileInfos.descriptionShort: XAR lets users experience an augmented reality world built on blockchain technology, with voxel-based creation and avatars.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: XAR combines augmented reality, blockchain, and AI to create a spatial computing platform where users interact with digital content overlaid on the real world. Users can generate voxel avatars called Personas, extract resources by shooting objects, and build custom creations. The platform enables location-based AR experiences with tokenized assets on Starknet. XAR uses multiple tokens including VOXEL for building materials and XAR for governance, with an economic system mirroring real-world resource extraction and creation.
profileInfos.tagLine: The first AR Autonomous World

products.name: XAR App
products.description: A mobile application that lets users experience augmented reality content anchored to real-world locations, interact with digital assets, and participate in location-based AR missions.

products.name: Persona
products.description: A feature that lets users create AI-generated voxel avatars as NFTs that can be displayed in augmented reality spaces and serve as a gateway to the XAR game ecosystem.

assets.name: XAR
assets.description: XAR is the governance token in the XAR ecosystem with a total supply of 1,000,000,000 tokens. It serves as payment for Spatial Advertising bids, functions as a universal currency for transactions, and enables governance participation.

assets.name: VOXEL
assets.description: VOXEL tokens are the building blocks of the entire XAR world. They come in two varieties: regular VOXELs that can be earned through shooting Creations, and rare glowing VOXELs that can only be obtained by planting Seeds.

assets.name: Energy Coin
assets.description: ENC is the on-chain version of Energy (EC) that can be earned through in-game activities like sharing Creations in the world.

assets.name: Persona
assets.description: Persona is a voxel-based avatar NFT in the XAR ecosystem, with 9 rarity levels determining Energy capacity. It serves as the main gateway to the XAR game and enables users to generate in-game Energy.

assets.name: Glowing VOXEL
assets.description: Rare, glowing versions of VOXEL tokens that can only be obtained by planting Seeds. Currently includes Red Glowing Voxels from Rose Seeds. They are essential materials for generating new Personas.

assets.name: Seeds
assets.description: Seeds are non-transferable assets that can be planted to generate rare glowing Voxels. Each type of Seed has a specific planting cycle and generates a specific color of Glowing Voxel.

assets.name: Flowerpots
assets.description: Flowerpots can be used to increase Seed productivity, with each Flowerpot allowing one Seed to be planted per day. New users start with one Flowerpot by default.

profileInfos.name: Underware
profileInfos.descriptionShort: A fully onchain game studio building on Starknet with Dojo
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Underware is a fully onchain game studio of veteran technologists, committed to building on and contributing to the Realms Network. They are extending the Realmsverse with an expansive autonomous underworld, and building various related games including a narrative dungeon crawler.
profileInfos.tagLine: A game studio building on-chain games and autonomous worlds

products.name: Pistols at Ten Blocks
products.description: A dueling game built on Starknet where players engage in honor duels using pistols. The game uses Dojo for on-chain gameplay and connects to the Realms ecosystem.

products.name: Loot Underworld
products.description: Loot Underworld is an on-chain game that enables players to explore procedurally generated dungeons. The game uses Starknet and Dojo to create an autonomous underworld that connects to the Realms ecosystem.

products.name: Underdark
products.description: Underdark is a 3D dungeon crawler where players navigate through procedurally generated chambers while managing limited light resources and avoiding monsters. The game runs on Starknet with Dojo and integrates with the Realms ecosystem.

profileInfos.name: Nethermind
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Nethermind builds software for Ethereum and Starknet networks, including execution clients, node tools, and blockchain explorers.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Nethermind is an Ethereum execution client built on .NET that delivers performance in syncing and tip-of-chain processing. It creates execution clients, node management solutions, and data access services. Nethermind also provides security services and AI tools for blockchain applications.
profileInfos.tagLine: Building blocks for the decentralized future

products.name: Nethermind Ethereum Client
products.description: Nethermind Ethereum Client is an Ethereum execution client built on .NET that processes transactions and maintains the blockchain state. It supports multiple networks and provides JSON-RPC endpoints for developers and operators.

products.name: Juno
products.description: Juno is a Starknet client written in Go that synchronizes state, processes transactions, and verifies blocks. It aims to decentralize Starknet by providing an alternative to the official client.

products.name: Sedge
products.description: Sedge is a one-click setup tool for PoS network/chain validators and nodes that helps with the configuration and deployment of validators for Ethereum and other networks.

products.name: Nine
products.description: Nethermind Intelligent Nodes Environment (Nine) is a framework for AI agents that allows distributed deployment and interfaces across environments.

products.name: AuditAgent
products.description: AuditAgent is a smart contract security tool that identifies vulnerabilities using AI and static analysis. It generates reports and suggests fixes for code issues.

products.name: starknet.go
products.description: starknet.go is a Golang library for StarkNet and Cairo that allows developers to interact with the StarkNet network.

products.name: Starkweb
products.description: StarkWeb is a TypeScript library that connects applications to the Starknet blockchain. It provides interfaces for data retrieval, transaction submission, and smart contract interaction.

products.name: Nethermind Security
products.description: Nethermind Security performs smart contract security assessments through static and dynamic code analysis techniques, detecting vulnerabilities in Solidity and Cairo implementations.

profileInfos.name: PWN Protocol
profileInfos.descriptionShort: PWN is a universal peer-to-peer lending protocol enabling fixed-rate loans using any token as collateral.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: PWN Protocol enables peer-to-peer lending where users can borrow against or lend using any digital asset including NFTs, with customizable loan terms. Its oracle-less design protects loans from price-based liquidations, with the only way to lose collateral being loan default.
profileInfos.tagLine: Universal lending market

products.name: PWN Protocol
products.description: PWN is a permissionless peer-to-peer lending protocol enabling fixed-rate loans using any digital asset as collateral, without price-based liquidations.

assets.name: PWN
assets.description: PWN is the native governance token of the PWN DAO, used for voting and staking to participate in protocol governance.

profileInfos.name: Pulsar Money
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Pulsar Money lets you send, receive, and manage digital assets through simple payment links, social transfers, and staking tools.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Pulsar Money helps individuals and businesses manage digital assets effortlessly. You can send and receive payments through social platforms, create simple payment links, and automate asset distribution with vesting tools. It also offers staking and invoicing solutions for better financial control. Pulsar Money simplifies blockchain payments, making transactions easier and more accessible.
profileInfos.tagLine: Building together The Smart Payments Hub

products.name: Smart Payments Hub
products.description: The Smart Payments Hub implements blockchain-based transfer functionalities through integrated modules, enabling streamlined asset management and social payments. The system facilitates digital asset transfers while maintaining cross-chain compatibility and user-friendly interfaces. The platform supports social media-based transactions, token distribution through vesting contracts, and secure token storage.

profileInfos.name: OnlyDust
profileInfos.descriptionShort: OnlyDust connects open-source contributors with blockchain projects and simplifies grant management for web3 ecosystems.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: OnlyDust provides a platform for open-source contributors to find blockchain projects and receive compensation for their work. The platform handles all aspects of project discovery, contribution tracking, and payment distribution, removing administrative barriers. For blockchain ecosystems, OnlyDust streamlines developer onboarding, enables efficient grant management, and provides ROI tracking. The platform supports projects from major ecosystems including Starknet, Stellar, Worldcoin, Ethereum, and Optimism.
profileInfos.tagLine: Open Source is tough, but it doesnâ€™t have to be.

products.name: OnlyDust Platform
products.description: OnlyDust Platform connects blockchain projects with developers through an open-source contribution model. It streamlines project discovery, contribution tracking, and reward distribution, eliminating bureaucratic obstacles. For contributors, the platform offers a personalized dashboard, project recommendations, and transparent payment systems. For blockchain ecosystems, it provides tools to track ROI, manage grants, and build developer communities. The platform integrates with GitHub for seamless contribution management.

profileInfos.name: Madara
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Madara helps developers build custom Starknet-compatible appchains using Cairo technology and the Substrate framework.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Madara provides an open-source stack for building Starknet-compatible appchains powered by Cairo. It implements a high-performance sequencer using the Substrate framework, allowing developers to create customizable blockchain infrastructure. With Madara, users can deploy specialized chains that benefit from Starknet's technology while maintaining flexibility for specific application requirements. The framework supports both L2 deployments on Ethereum and L3 deployments on Starknet, integrating with existing tooling and enabling features like high throughput and scalability.
profileInfos.tagLine: Building the integrity web

products.name: Madara
products.description: Madara implements a powerful hybrid Starknet client and sequencer in Rust, facilitating the creation of Starknet-compatible appchains through the Substrate framework. The system provides developers with components to build and deploy custom Cairo-powered chains with full Starknet compatibility.

profileInfos.name: Loot Survivor
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Loot Survivor uses Starknet to host a survival arcade game where players fight and evade monsters to collect loot and achieve high scores.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Loot Survivor hosts a fully on-chain arcade dungeon crawler on Starknet. Players enter dungeons with dynamically generated challenges, combat beasts using weapons and armor, and collect items to improve survival chances. Each play costs LORDS tokens, and the game maintains an immutable leaderboard with rewards for top performers. Game states exist in a single storage slot, optimizing on-chain efficiency. Death is permanent, creating high-stakes gameplay with strategic depth in character development and resource management.
profileInfos.tagLine: A fully onchain, rogue-like, arcade dungeon crawler.

products.name: Loot Survivor
products.description: Loot Survivor implements a fully on-chain arcade game through optimized Cairo contracts on Starknet, enabling permanent and immutable gameplay. The system compresses player state into a single storage slot for gas efficiency while maintaining complex dungeon generation mechanics. Players can attack monsters, collect items, upgrade character stats, and compete for leaderboard positions. The implementation includes permanent NFT collection mechanisms for unique beasts encountered during gameplay.

profileInfos.name: Jokers of Neon
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Jokers of Neon is a roguelike deck-builder fully on-chain card game where players face challenges while building strategic decks with special cards and modifiers.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Jokers of Neon is a roguelike deck-builder card game on the Starknet blockchain. Players navigate through levels with escalating point targets, strategically enhancing their decks with special cards, modifiers, and jokers. The game features weekly leaderboards and offers competitive gameplay with transparent on-chain mechanics.
profileInfos.tagLine: Build your deck, rule the game.

products.name: Jokers of Neon Game
products.description: A strategy on-chain card game where players build decks with special cards and modifiers, compete for points, and advance through levels with increasing difficulty.

profileInfos.name: Influence
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Influence is a fully onchain space strategy MMO set in the asteroid belt of Adalia, where players can mine, build, trade, and expand settlements.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Influence is a fully onchain space strategy MMO developed by Unstoppable Games. Set in the Adalian asteroid belt, the game features realistic orbital mechanics, scientifically-based production chains, and a player-driven economy. Players control crews of various specialists to mine resources, construct buildings, manufacture goods, and trade in player-owned marketplaces.
profileInfos.tagLine: Space Strategy MMO Game

products.name: Influence
products.description: Influence is a fully onchain space strategy MMO set in the asteroid belt of Adalia. Players can mine raw materials, produce items, construct settlements, travel across the belt, and trade in player-driven marketplaces, all while maintaining realistic orbital mechanics and science-based production chains.

assets.name: SWAY
assets.description: SWAY is the base currency in Influence, used for all fees and buy-side transactions on in-game marketplaces.

profileInfos.name: Grug's Lair
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Grug's Lair creates onchain games on Starknet with a focus on player ownership and strategic gameplay.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Grug's Lair is a gaming studio dedicated to crafting top-tier onchain games on Starknet. The studio develops strategic games with true digital ownership, including Blob Arena and Rising Revenant, leveraging the Dojo game engine and Unity for gameplay experiences that balance fun mechanics with blockchain integration.
profileInfos.tagLine: Pioneering the future of Gaming

products.name: Blob Arena
products.description: A tactical battle game featuring unique characters called "Bloberts" that engage in strategic PokÃ©mon-like combat with a rock-paper-scissors style system enhanced by character attributes.

products.name: Rising Revenant
products.description: A last-man-standing tactics game where players establish and defend outposts against random catastrophic events, with strategic depth and reinforcement mechanisms in a fight for survival.

assets.name: Revenant Outposts
assets.description: NFT outposts that players establish and defend in the Rising Revenant game, subject to random events and capable of being reinforced with defenses.

profileInfos.name: Focus Tree
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Focus Tree helps users manage screen time better by blocking distractions during focus sessions and rewarding productivity with digital garden items on Starknet.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Focus Tree is a productivity app that helps users build a healthier relationship with technology through gamified focusing sessions. Users can join shared gardens, grow digital items by focusing, and trade collected items on marketplaces. Built on Starknet, it leverages Web3 to create community-driven incentives for staying focused.
profileInfos.tagLine: The new focus app for students

products.name: Focus Tree
products.description: Focus Tree App helps users manage screen time by blocking distractions during focus sessions and rewarding productivity with digital garden items that can be collected and traded.

assets.name: Tiles
assets.description: Digital items earned through focus sessions that can be collected, used to customize gardens, and traded on marketplaces.

profileInfos.name: Eternum
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Realms Eternum offers on-chain economic strategy gaming where players manage resources, attack others, and trade on Starknet's L2 platform.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Realms Eternum provides an on-chain economic strategy game built on Starknet. Players manage realms, gather resources, attack other players, and trade in a persistent digital economy. The game uses LORDS tokens for transactions and governance. Created by Bibliotheca DAO, Realms Eternum focuses on player-driven economics and social frameworks within a digital ecosystem. The game operates on the Realms L3 blockchain and integrates with Starknet infrastructure.
profileInfos.tagLine: Multiplayer Civilization with a real economy that never sleeps

products.name: Realms Eternum
products.description: Realms Eternum implements a fully on-chain strategy game through Starknet's zero-knowledge rollup technology, enabling resource management and player-to-player combat. The system processes realm ownership, resource production, and market transactions while maintaining cross-blockchain compatibility. Players can gather resources, build structures, attack other realms, and trade assets in a persistent digital economy using LORDS tokens.

profileInfos.name: Dope Wars
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Dope Wars lets players trade virtual goods on blockchain networks via a set of interconnected games with NFT characters and items.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Dope Wars provides a set of blockchain games focused on trading and strategy. Players use NFT characters called Hustlers equipped with digital items to participate in gameplay across Ethereum, Optimism, and Starknet networks. The project includes multiple games with the main one being an adaptation of the classic Drug Wars calculator game where players arbitrage virtual goods across different locations. Dope Wars uses PAPER tokens for governance and in-game currency, with all decisions made through its DAO structure.
profileInfos.tagLine: Venture into Dope Wars: DAO-governed, onchain games.

products.name: Dope Wars
products.description: Dope Wars Game implements an onchain version of the classic Drug Wars trading simulation on Starknet. Players trade goods between locations while managing risks from random events and other players.

assets.name: PAPER
assets.description: PAPER functions as the protocol governance token for Dope Wars, implementing stake-weighted voting and fee distribution mechanisms. The token has a fixed supply of 1.5 billion.

assets.name: DOPE
assets.description: DOPE NFT serves as the foundational token for the Dope Wars ecosystem, enabling the creation of in-game characters and providing governance rights within the DAO.

assets.name: Hustlers
assets.description: Hustlers function as customizable player characters in the Dope Wars ecosystem, allowing equipment of various items and participation in different games.

assets.name: Dope Wars Gear
assets.description: Dope Gear implements the ERC-1155 standard for interchangeable equipment that players can attach to their Hustler characters for in-game benefits.

profileInfos.name: Dojo
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Dojo helps developers build provable games and applications on Starknet by providing a toolkit and framework for onchain development.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Dojo is a toolchain designed for building provable games and applications. It extends Cairo, allowing developers to create applications that are natively composable, extensible, permissionless, and persistent. The framework reduces complexity in developing provable applications that can be deployed to and verified by blockchains, particularly Starknet.
profileInfos.tagLine: an open-source toolchain for building provable games and autonomous worlds

products.name: Dojo Engine
products.description: Dojo Engine implements a provable game engine through Cairo smart contracts, enabling fast onchain game development with built-in components for state management and game logic.

profileInfos.name: The Grid
profileInfos.descriptionShort: The Grid is a data company that provides structured information about web3 projects to be used by other data companies.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: The Grid aims to be the authorive source of metadata to be used by data platforms around the world. Its primary usecase is to be used to augment exsisting data platforms so they no longer need to re-collect similar data as other data platforms. They use the concept of 'lenses' to be able to provide differnt views, these lens are Profile, Product, Asset and Entity as these are the primary views used by data platforms in Web3.
profileInfos.tagLine: A Node of Truth for offchain data

products.name: The Grid Data API
products.description: This data API provides structured information about Web3 projects following the The Grid Standard (TGS) data schema.

products.name: The Grid Data Explorer
products.description: This is a simple way to view the data that is available from The Grid. It is meant to be a reference implementation using GraphQL to make it easier for other data platforms to integrate.

profileInfos.name: Apibara
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Apibara provides infrastructure for streaming, transforming, and integrating blockchain data into Web2 services with low latency.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Apibara offers a platform for building blockchain indexers that connect on-chain data to Web2 services. The platform implements Direct Node Access (DNA) technology that enables applications to stream data directly from nodes using efficient binary protocols, resulting in lower latency and higher throughput.
profileInfos.tagLine: Stream. Transform. Integrate.

products.name: Apibara DNA
products.description: Apibara DNA is a protocol for streaming on-chain data directly to applications through efficient binary protocols. The system enables data filtering at the node level to reduce bandwidth usage while maintaining transaction composability.

products.name: Apibara CLI
products.description: Apibara CLI is a Command-line interface tool that helps developers interact with Apibara services. It enables setting up and running indexers locally, connecting to data sources, and managing deployments.

products.name: Apibara Hosted Service
products.description: Apibara Hosted Service is a cloud service for deploying indexers without infrastructure management. It provides a web-based console for monitoring and controlling data streams.

profileInfos.name: Foundry
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Foundry provides fast, modular toolkits for blockchain development, supporting both Ethereum and Starknet smart contract ecosystems.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Foundry offers development toolkits for building blockchain applications. Its main product enables Ethereum smart contract development with components for testing, blockchain interaction, local node simulation, and interactive Solidity coding. Foundry also provides Starknet Foundry for Cairo contract development on Starknet. Both toolkits focus on speed, modularity, and developer experience with features including testing frameworks, debugging tools, and network interactions. Written in Rust, Foundry tools deliver high performance for efficient blockchain application development workflows.
profileInfos.tagLine: Foundry is a blazing fast, portable and modular toolkit for Ethereum application development written in Rust.

products.name: Foundry
products.description: Foundry is a toolkit for Ethereum blockchain development written in Rust. It features four main components: Forge for testing and deploying smart contracts, Cast for interacting with blockchain networks, Anvil for running a local Ethereum node, and Chisel for Solidity REPL. Designed for performance and efficiency, Foundry supports both Solidity and Vyper languages with capabilities including fuzz testing, debugging, and RPC forking, all in a unified developer experience.

products.name: Starknet Foundry
products.description: Starknet Foundry provides a development environment for building applications on Starknet. It includes specialized tools for compiling, testing, and deploying Cairo contracts in a Starknet environment. The toolkit facilitates efficient development workflows with features like test automation, debugging capabilities, and network interaction tools. Built with the same focus on speed and developer experience as the original Foundry, Starknet Foundry enables developers to create reliable and secure applications for the Starknet ecosystem.

profileInfos.name: Software Mansion
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Software Mansion offers software development services with focus on React Native, Starknet tools, blockchain technologies, and multimedia systems.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Software Mansion provides software development services focusing on blockchain, React Native, and multimedia technology solutions. The company creates developer tools for Starknet and maintains multiple SDKs for Starknet interaction in Python, JVM, and Swift. The company builds custom software solutions for clients while contributing to open-source technologies.
profileInfos.tagLine: Custom Software Development Company

products.name: Starknet Foundry
products.description: Starknet Foundry is a toolkit for testing and deploying tools for Starknet smart contracts through a command-line interface. The toolkit enables developers to write, test, and deploy Cairo contracts with built-in testing frameworks and deployment utilities.

products.name: Scarb
products.description: Scarb is a package manager and build tool for the Cairo programming language. The tool handles compilation, dependency management, and project configuration for Cairo applications and Starknet contracts. The system implements standardized project structures and builds processes for Cairo development.

products.name: Starknet Libraries
products.description: Starknet Libraries provide development interfaces for interacting with Starknet blockchain from multiple programming languages. The libraries include starknet.py for Python, starknet.jvm for JVM languages, and starknet.swift for Swift applications. Each library implements methods for reading blockchain state, sending transactions, managing accounts, and interacting with smart contracts.

profileInfos.name: Spiko
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Spiko offers money market funds backed by Treasury Bills through blockchain technology for yields and liquidity.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Spiko is a platform for tokenized money market funds backed by Treasury Bills. Users earn returns on cash holdings through UCITS-approved funds denominated in EUR or USD. Funds maintain daily liquidity with no notice periods or penalties.
profileInfos.tagLine: Seamless access to the risk-free rate

products.name: Spiko EU T-Bills Money Market Fund
