products.name: Spiko US T-Bills Money Market Fund
products.description: Spiko US T-Bills Money Market Fund is an ERC-20 token representing shares in a regulated money market fund that invests in U.S. Treasury Bills.

assets.name: Spiko EU T-Bills Money Market Fund
assets.description: EUTBL is an ERC-20 token representing shares in a regulated money market fund that invests in Treasury Bills issued by stable Eurozone countries.

assets.name: Spiko US T-Bills Money Market Fund
assets.description: USTBL is an ERC-20 token representing shares in a regulated money market fund that invests in U.S. Treasury Bills.

profileInfos.name: Starknet-rs
profileInfos.descriptionShort: starknet-rs helps developers interact with Starknet blockchain using a Rust client library that covers all major API functions.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: starknet-rs gives Rust developers a client library for Starknet blockchain. It offers API clients for nodes and sequencers, contract deployment tools, account support, and cryptographic functions. Developers can build applications that connect to Starknet, deploy and use smart contracts, and process transactions.
profileInfos.tagLine: Complete Starknet library in Rust

products.name: starknet-rs
products.description: starknet-rs is a comprehensive Rust library for Starknet that enables developers to build applications that connect to and interact with the Starknet blockchain.

profileInfos.name: Unruggable Meme
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Unruggable Meme provides a framework for creating safer memecoins with locked liquidity and transfer restrictions.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Unruggable Meme helps developers launch safer memecoins on Starknet by using smart contracts with built-in protections. The framework includes token creation, liquidity locking, and launch tools for various exchanges, ensuring transparency and deterring scams in the memecoin ecosystem.
profileInfos.tagLine: A memecoin standard and deployment tool designed to ensure a maximum safety for memecoin traders.

products.name: Unruggable Meme
products.description: A framework that enables developers to create and launch memecoins with built-in safety features including liquidity locking and transfer restrictions.

profileInfos.name: Ventory
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Ventory is a multi-chain NFT marketplace for trading, minting, and collecting NFTs with low transaction costs and features like NFT staking and launchpad services.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Ventory is an NFT marketplace with tools for buying, selling, and managing digital assets. It supports NFT staking, portfolio tracking, and collection filtering across multiple blockchains. The marketplace aggregates listings from other platforms, shows price data, and allows users to stake NFTs to earn rewards. Ventory also includes a launchpad for new NFT projects and meme coins.
profileInfos.tagLine: Your Multi-Chain NFT Hub: fast, low-cost and reliable marketplace for anyone, anywhere

products.name: Ventory Marketplace
products.description: Ventory Marketplace enables NFT trading on Starknet with features including portfolio tracking, trait filtering, and rarity ranking. The platform aggregates listings from other marketplaces and supports bulk actions for NFT management.

products.name: Ventory.fun
products.description: Ventory.fun facilitates the launch of meme coins and NFTs using bonding curve mechanisms for instant liquidity. It integrates the STRK404 token standard for NFT-to-token conversions.

assets.name: Ventorians NFT
assets.description: Ventorians NFT is a collection of 3333 warrior NFTs on Starknet. Holders can stake their NFTs to receive platform benefits including fee discounts and rewards distribution.

assets.name: VEN
assets.description: VEN is the utility token for the Ventory platform, providing fee discounts and governance capabilities for holders.

assets.name: xVEN
assets.description: xVEN is a pre-launch token that can be earned through community activities and will be convertible to VEN tokens in the future.

assets.name: Ventory Crystals
assets.description: Ventory Crystals is a series of NFT collections deployed on the Starknet blockchain by Ventory. Each collection has a different name that reflects a gemstone type and visual attribute, with exactly 300 items in each collection.

profileInfos.name: Unframed
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Unframed provides a marketplace for trading NFTs on Starknet, including art, profile pictures, music, and memberships.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Unframed offers a marketplace for discovering and trading NFTs on Starknet. The platform supports various NFT types including art, profile pictures, music, and memberships, all secured by Ethereum and powered by Starknet's technology. Unframed features one-click checkout enabled by Account Abstraction and was developed by the Argent team.
profileInfos.tagLine: Discover & trade Starknet NFTs

products.name: Unframed Marketplace
products.description: Unframed Marketplace enables users to list, buy, and sell NFTs on Starknet. It features one-click checkout through Account Abstraction and supports various NFT types including art, profile pictures, music, and memberships.

profileInfos.name: Txspace
profileInfos.descriptionShort: TxSpaces is a fully on-chain idle defense game on Starknet where players deploy warriors to defend against alien monsters and earn rewards.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: TxSpaces is a merge and idle defense game built on Starknet by TxGames Studio. Players must survive waves of alien monsters by summoning and merging powerful warriors to establish defensive barriers. By defeating monsters, players earn in-game currency with attractive value. The game features social elements like visiting friends' bases, leaderboards, and daily quests. TxSpaces delivers a unique gaming experience where players can earn while playing directly through blockchain technology, combining strategic defense with idle earning mechanics.
profileInfos.tagLine: Eat, sleep & survive with TxSpaces

products.name: TxSpaces
products.description: TxSpaces game offers an engaging merge and idle defense experience where players summon warriors to defend against alien attackers. Key features include buying and merging soldiers to increase firepower, upgrading treasure pools, using the Army Shop to purchase new warriors and boosters, competing on leaderboards, and interacting with friends. Players can earn three types of currency: Shard for basic in-game activities, Kryptonite as a premium currency, and TXS as the native token. The game merges idle mechanics with strategic defense in a fully on-chain experience.

assets.name: TXS
assets.description: TXS is the utility token of the TxSpaces ecosystem, used for purchasing premium in-game items, boosters with higher odds, and Kryptonite currency. It powers the game's economy and can be earned through referral activities.

profileInfos.name: Trail of Bits
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Trail of Bits provides blockchain security services, including smart contract audits, design assessment, and vulnerability analysis for Web3 projects.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Trail of Bits helps secure blockchain technology through comprehensive security assessments, code reviews, and tool development. The company provides specialized services for smart contracts, nodes, bridges, DeFi protocols, and off-chain components across multiple blockchain ecosystems including Ethereum, Solana, and others. They also develop and maintain open-source security tools like Slither, Echidna, and Medusa.
profileInfos.tagLine: We don't just fix bugs, we fix software.

products.name: Software Assurance
products.description: Trail of Bits provides comprehensive security assessments for blockchain applications, including audits of smart contracts, design assessments, and early-stage reviews.

products.name: Open Source Security Tools
products.description: Trail of Bits develops and maintains a suite of open-source security tools for blockchain developers, including Slither (static analyzer), Echidna and Medusa (smart contract fuzzers), and other utility libraries for enhancing blockchain security.

profileInfos.name: Teandy
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Teandy provides blockchain analytics and community engagement tools, focusing on StarkNet ecosystem data visualization and game tracking.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Teandy develops data analytics and community platforms for blockchain gaming projects. Their products include StarkSight.xyz, an analytics platform for tracking StarkNet NFTs and market data, and StarkSight.plus, a community forum for blockchain gaming projects that enables asset tracking, wallet linking, and game data visualization.
profileInfos.tagLine: Data & Blockchain Software Solutions

products.name: StarkSight
products.description: An analytics platform focused on visualizing StarkNet NFT and market data with interactive charts.

products.name: StarkSight Plus
products.description: A community forum for blockchain gaming projects enabling discussion, wallet linking, asset tracking, and game data visualization.

profileInfos.name: Loot Underworld
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Loot Underworld creates an autonomous underworld with procedurally generated dungeons on Starknet using Dojo, extending the Realms ecosystem.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Loot Underworld builds an autonomous underworld with procedurally generated dungeons and narrative experiences on Starknet using Dojo. The project extends the Realms ecosystem with composable building blocks and tools that enable interoperable game experiences. Funded through grants from Frontinus House and BibliothecaDAO, Loot Underworld focuses on exploration and narrative gameplay.
profileInfos.tagLine: Excavating the endless mysteries of the subterranean in an autonomous (under)world

products.name: Loot Underworld: The Game
products.description: A narrative-driven dungeon crawler where players explore procedurally generated chambers in an autonomous underworld. The game uses Starknet and Dojo to create persistent on-chain experiences that connect to the broader Realms ecosystem.

products.name: Underdark: Lair of the Slenderduck
products.description: A 3D dungeon crawler where players explore the lair of the Slenderduck, managing limited light resources while avoiding monsters. Built on Starknet with Dojo, it features procedurally generated chambers and on-chain gameplay.

profileInfos.name: Realms World
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Realms World provides onchain games on Starknet and a custom L3 network, focusing on gaming, economic systems, and player-owned assets.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Realms World offers onchain games built on Starknet and a custom L3 network. The platform includes strategy games like Eternum, arcade games like Loot Survivor, and other titles in different development stages. Users interact with $Lords tokens for transactions and governance through the Lordship Protocol. The system supports NFT collections and staking mechanisms. BibliothecaDAO manages the platform, which aims to create a connected gaming ecosystem where developers can build and expand using open tools and frameworks.
profileInfos.tagLine: Home to the Adventurers

products.name: Realms L3 Network
products.description: Realms L3 Network is a zkVM-based layer-3 solution built on Starknet, designed for onchain gaming applications. The network processes game transactions with reduced fees and higher throughput while maintaining security through proof validation on Starknet. Developers can deploy smart contracts and game logic on the network to create persistent game states.

assets.name: Lords
assets.description: Lords is the utility and governance token for the Realms World ecosystem, enabling in-game transactions, staking for rewards, and protocol governance when locked in the Lordship Protocol.

assets.name: Voting LORDS
assets.description: Voting LORDS (veLORDS) is a staked derivative of the Lords tokens, providing governance rights and protocol emission rewards.

profileInfos.name: Calimero
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Calimero Network enables building self-sovereign applications with data ownership and verified computing capabilities.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Calimero Network helps developers build peer-to-peer applications focused on data ownership. It includes verification systems to check the authenticity of actions, encryption for messages between users, and local storage options. Applications built with Calimero store data on user devices, verify actions with digital signatures and maintain private communications between peers.
profileInfos.tagLine: Bringing data ownership back to you

products.name: Calimero Network
products.description: Calimero Network provides tools for building self-sovereign applications that store data locally on user devices. These applications use client-side validation to verify actions, secure encryption for protecting communications, and local data vaults to maintain user control. Developers can create applications using standard programming languages without specialized cryptography knowledge.

profileInfos.name: Tauvlo
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Tauvlo helps people invest in real estate through tokenized assets on blockchain, offering fractional ownership and simplified investment solutions.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Tauvlo connects individuals with tokenized real estate opportunities through a marketplace of fractional ownership. It enables users to invest in properties through digital tokens compliant with EU MiCA regulations, while also providing businesses a platform to tokenize their assets for raising capital.
profileInfos.tagLine: Invest. Earn. Impact.

products.name: Tauvlo Marketplace
products.description: Tauvlo Marketplace implements blockchain-based tokenization through Asset-Referenced Tokens (ARTs) operating on the Polygon network, enabling fractional ownership of real estate assets. The system processes USDC payments and bank transfers while maintaining MiCA compliance through integrated KYC procedures. The platform supports token issuance, distribution, and management for both investors and asset owners. Technical features include enhanced ERC-20 tokens with trustlines and freeze functionality for improved security and regulatory adherence.

profileInfos.name: Starknet Monitor
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Starknet Monitor shows vital statistics about Starknet and core infrastructure.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: A monitoring dashboard that displays real-time statistics about the Starknet network, including block information, user operations, and transaction data.
profileInfos.tagLine: A monitoring tool that shows vital statistics about Starknet and core infrastructure

products.name: Starknet Monitor
products.description: A monitoring dashboard that displays real-time statistics about the Starknet network, including block information, user operations, and transaction data.

profileInfos.name: StarkDefi
profileInfos.descriptionShort: StarkDeFi helps users swap tokens and access DeFi services with low gas fees on Starknet.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: StarkDeFi is a decentralized suite of products built on Starknet, offering yield farming, staking, NFT minting, token issuance, and other financial services at low cost, making it easier for users to explore Web3.
profileInfos.tagLine: we take you from zero to web3 hero

products.name: StarkDeFi Swap
products.description: StarkDeFi Swap implements an AMM protocol on Starknet, facilitating token exchanges with minimal fees and instant finality. The system allows permissionless trading while maintaining security through the underlying Starknet infrastructure. Users can add or remove liquidity at their convenience with no additional costs. StarkDeFi Swap supports limit orders, enabling traders to set buy/sell execution at predetermined price points.

assets.name: SDC
assets.description: SDC functions as the native utility token for StarkDeFi's ecosystem on Starknet, enabling access to platform features including staking, governance, and special privileges across protocol products.

profileInfos.name: Stark Sailor
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Stark Sailor helps players experience fully on-chain naval adventures by building and battling ships in a Starknet-based ocean world.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Stark Sailor offers a fully on-chain gaming experience on Starknet where players manage islands and engage in automated naval combat. Players collect ships, weapons, and sea monsters while expanding their territory and battling other sailors across multiple game modes including Treasure Hunting and Raid Island.
profileInfos.tagLine: Sailors explore the sea route on Starknet

products.name: Stark Sailor Game
products.description: Stark Sailor Game implements fully on-chain naval gameplay using the Dojo Engine on Starknet, enabling island management and auto-combat features through Cairo smart contracts.

assets.name: SAIL Token
assets.description: SAIL functions as the governance and utility token for Stark Sailor, facilitating in-game rewards and ecosystem participation.

profileInfos.name: Craft Island
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Craft Island allows players to expand and decorate virtual islands, farm resources, and adventure with friends using blockchain technology on Starknet.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Craft Island enables players to create and own virtual islands where they can farm resources, build structures, and adventure with friends. Built on Starknet using Dojo, the game offers blockchain-based ownership and autonomous world capabilities using Unreal Engine 5.
profileInfos.tagLine: Expand and decorate your island, farm resources, go on adventures

products.name: Craft Island Game
products.description: Craft Island Game lets players create and own virtual islands where they can farm resources, expand their territory, and go on adventures with friends. The game combines blockchain technology with immersive gameplay.

profileInfos.name: Spaceshard
profileInfos.descriptionShort: SpaceShard is an R&D blockchain lab focusing on Zero-Knowledge technology within the Starkware ecosystem.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: SpaceShard is a blockchain R&D lab that builds developer tools and infrastructure for the Starknet ecosystem. The company specializes in Zero-Knowledge technology and works to bring it closer to mass adoption through improved tooling and user experience.
profileInfos.tagLine: Bringing Zero-Knowledge technology to mass adoption.

products.name: Starknet Rivet
products.description: Starknet Rivet is a developer wallet for the Starknet ecosystem. It provides developers with tools to set up local Starknet testing environments, manage accounts, explore blocks and transactions, deploy contracts, and connect to dApps. The wallet simplifies local development and testing while maintaining compatibility with both Devnet-js and Devnet-rs.

products.name: Starknet Devnet
products.description: Starknet Devnet is a local testnet for Starknet development written in Rust. It allows developers to test Starknet applications locally with features including forking network states, account impersonation, L1-L2 interactions, predeployed contracts, block manipulations, and time manipulations.

products.name: Starknet Hardhat Plugin
products.description: Starknet Hardhat Plugin integrates Starknet development into the Hardhat environment. It enables developers to compile, deploy, and interact with Starknet smart contracts using JavaScript. The plugin supports testing through JavaScript, simplifies contract deployment, and facilitates seamless interaction with Starknet networks, enhancing the developer experience and improving workflow efficiency for those building on Starknet.

profileInfos.name: Nimbora
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Nimbora offers yield strategies on Starknet, allowing users to earn, stake, and borrow with low fees.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Nimbora is a 1-click DeFi pooling platform on Starknet that enables users to interact with Ethereum Layer 1 protocols at a fraction of the cost. It scales L1 DeFi via L2 execution seamlessly with super-low fees, using Zero-Knowledge Rollups technology.
profileInfos.tagLine: Omnichain 1-Click Yield Strategies on Starknet

products.name: Nimbora YieldDex
products.description: A yield aggregation platform built on Starknet that enables users to access various yield strategies from Ethereum L1 protocols with lower fees.

products.name: STRK Liquid Staking
products.description: A liquid staking solution for Starknet's STRK token, allowing users to stake STRK and receive sSTRK tokens that can be used in other DeFi activities while earning staking rewards.

products.name: Nimbora SDK
products.description: A software development kit that allows developers to integrate with Nimbora YieldDex, providing tools for building DeFi pooling applications on Starknet.

assets.name: sSTRK
assets.description: sSTRK is Nimbora's liquid staking token for STRK, reflecting the user's staked position that increases in value over time as it accrues staking rewards.

profileInfos.name: Snapshot
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Snapshot provides a customizable governance platform for DAOs and Web3 organizations, enabling gasless voting and proposal creation.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Snapshot offers a governance platform for decentralized organizations to conduct voting and decision-making. The protocol features gasless voting using signed messages, customizable voting strategies, and multiple voting systems. Organizations can create spaces with custom branding, use flexible validation strategies, and benefit from integrations with discussion forums. Snapshot X extends the platform's capabilities to include on-chain execution while maintaining the same user experience, allowing communities to implement decisions across multiple blockchains.
profileInfos.tagLine: Turn chaos to consensus

products.name: Snapshot
products.description: Snapshot implements a governance framework through a modular architecture, enabling customizable voting power calculation and decision-making processes. The system processes signed messages for gasless voting while maintaining transaction composability through blockchain integration. Snapshot offers over 400 voting strategies, multiple voting mechanisms, and cross-chain verification.

products.name: Snapshot X
products.description: Snapshot X implements on-chain governance through a cross-chain protocol, facilitating secure voting and trustless execution on multiple networks. The system computes voting power using storage proofs while maintaining compatibility with standard wallets. Snapshot X processes transactions using meta-transaction relayers, enabling gasless interactions and automated execution through modular execution strategies.

profileInfos.name: SithSwap
profileInfos.descriptionShort: SithSwap enables token trading on StarkNet through a dual-liquidity AMM supporting both volatile and stable swaps with low slippage and fees.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: SithSwap provides a dual-liquidity automated market maker on StarkNet supporting both volatile and stable asset swaps. The protocol implements familiar Uniswap V2-like APIs for integration while adding features for low-slippage trades of correlated assets and directional fees. SithSwap offers liquidity infrastructure for StarkNet protocols to launch and grow through its incentives system with staking pools, gauges, and bribes. The protocol includes SITH token emissions that can be escrowed to unlock governance benefits and influence protocol parameters.
profileInfos.tagLine: The Next Gen AMM

products.name: SithSwap AMM
products.description: SithSwap AMM implements a dual-liquidity engine through Cairo smart contracts on StarkNet, enabling both volatile and stable asset swaps. The system computes real-time pricing across unified liquidity pools while maintaining transaction composability. The protocol integrates staking pools for liquidity providers, with optional escrow positions for enhanced yield and governance rights. SithSwap supports directional fees and customizable trading pair configurations tailored to specific liquidity profiles.

assets.name: SithSwap Token
assets.description: SITH functions as the utility and governance token for SithSwap protocol, implementing rewards distribution and vote-escrow mechanisms for protocol governance.

profileInfos.name: SimpleSwap
profileInfos.descriptionShort: SimpleSwap helps users exchange cryptocurrencies without registration by providing a platform for swapping digital assets with fixed or floating rates.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: SimpleSwap enables fast cryptocurrency exchanges without registration or limits. The service supports over 1500 cryptocurrencies and fiat options, featuring both fixed and floating exchange rates. Users can quickly swap digital assets by selecting their desired pair and recipient address.
profileInfos.tagLine: Free from sign-up, limits, complications

products.name: SimpleSwap Mobile App
products.description: The SimpleSwap Mobile App allows users to swap cryptocurrency pairs on mobile devices, with features like saved addresses, exchange history, and push notifications.

products.name: SimpleSwap Exchange Platform
products.description: SimpleSwap Exchange Platform facilitates cryptocurrency trades by analyzing rates from various sources. The system identifies beneficial trading options based on the selected cryptocurrency pair. Users choose between fixed rates for price stability or floating rates for potential better returns. The interface requires minimal input: trading pair selection and a recipient address. The exchange process is automated without requiring account creation or personal information.

profileInfos.name: Carbonable
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Carbonable is a platform for businesses to manage and verify carbon contributions using transparent blockchain-based tracking.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Carbonable offers businesses a platform to manage and verify carbon removal contributions. The system digitizes carbon assets, tracks project performance using satellite imagery and AI, and generates transparent reports. Using blockchain technology, Carbonable creates verifiable data for each carbon contribution, ensuring integrity.
profileInfos.tagLine: Streamline Carbon Contributions with Integrity

products.name: Carbonable  Protocol
products.description: Carbon Protocol is a suite of smart contracts that digitizes carbon assets from verified nature-based projects, creates tokenized representations on Starknet, and provides businesses with tools to plan, monitor, and report their climate action with integrity.

profileInfos.name: Pyramid
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Pyramid helps users trade NFTs on Starknet by providing a marketplace, launchpad, and API services for NFT data and transactions.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Pyramid is an NFT marketplace on Starknet for trading digital assets and collections. Users can browse, buy, and sell NFTs with clear pricing, and creators can launch new collections through the permissionless launchpad. The platform serves both collectors and developers in the Starknet ecosystem with a focus on digital asset management.
profileInfos.tagLine: Discover a new dimension on Pyramid NFT Marketplace

products.name: Pyramid Marketplace
products.description: Pyramid Marketplace is a full-featured NFT marketplace on Starknet that facilitates trading, listing, and collection management. Users can view transaction history, make bids, create listings, and explore verified collections.

products.name: Pyramid Launchpad
products.description: Pyramid Launchpad is a permissionless NFT launchpad on Starknet that facilitates collection creation and deployment. The system processes metadata uploads, generates smart contracts, and manages minting processes for creators. Users can configure collection parameters, upload assets, set pricing models, and launch to the marketplace through a standardized workflow while maintaining collection ownership.

products.name: Pyramid API
products.description: Pyramid API is a developer-oriented API infrastructure for Starknet NFT data access and blockchain interaction. The system provides RESTful endpoints for retrieving NFT metadata, collection information, and transaction history while maintaining consistent data formatting standards. Developers can access Pathfinder node endpoints and indexing services through authenticated requests for custom integration into applications.

profileInfos.name: Starkware
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Starkware builds STARK-based scaling solutions for blockchains focused on security, scalability, and privacy.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Starkware produces blockchain infrastructure that uses STARK proofs to scale Ethereum. Its products include StarkEx, a scaling engine for applications requiring high throughput, and Starknet, a permissionless Layer 2 validity rollup. Starkware's technology is based on Cairo, a programming language for creating provable programs that allow any computation to be verified cryptographically.
profileInfos.tagLine: STARK Proof Pioneers

products.name: Cairo
products.description: Cairo is a programming language for developing STARK-provable programs and smart contracts. The language supports general computation and smart contract development on Starknet, a Layer 2 blockchain. Cairo offers Rust-like syntax, built-in testing capabilities, and tools for generating validity proofs. The language enables developers to build scalable applications without requiring deep zero-knowledge-proof expertise.

products.name: Papyrus
products.description: Papyrus is a Starknet full-node implementation written in Rust. It allows users to run their own infrastructure for interacting with the Starknet network while maintaining decentralization.

products.name: Stone Prover
products.description: Stone Prover is the STARK-proof generation system that powers StarkWare's products. The system generates cryptographic proofs that verify computational integrity while maintaining high performance.

products.name: Stwo Prover
products.description: Stwo Prover is a next-generation STARK prover that implements the Circle STARK protocol. It processes blockchain transactions with efficiency and lower costs.

products.name: StarkEx
products.description: StarkEx is a Layer 2 scaling engine that provides high throughput and low gas costs for applications such as NFT minting, trading, spot trading, and derivatives.

profileInfos.name: Ritual
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Ritual enables smart contracts to access AI models through a decentralized network of nodes, bringing off-chain compute capabilities on-chain.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Ritual is building a sovereign execution layer for AI. Infernet bridges off-chain compute to on-chain applications, allowing smart contracts to access on-chain and off-chain models. Ritual provides censorship resistance, privacy capabilities, and verifiable computations for AI model operations.
profileInfos.tagLine: The world's sovereign chain for AI

products.name: Infernet
products.description: Infernet is a lightweight framework that enables smart contract developers to request computation from off-chain Infernet Nodes and deliver results to consuming on-chain smart contracts.

products.name: Ritual Chain
products.description: Ritual Chain is a specialized execution layer built for running AI operations on-chain. Ritual Chain will allow developers to create verifiable AI-powered applications without specialized ML knowledge.

profileInfos.name: Retro Bridge
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Retro Bridge enables asset transfers between EVM and non-EVM networks using concentrated liquidity pools instead of smart contracts.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Retro Bridge transfers assets between 41+ blockchain networks, including EVM and non-EVM chains. It uses concentrated liquidity pools on each chain rather than smart contracts for transactions. Retro Bridge supports several functions, including regular bridging, multi-destination transfers, cross-chain swaps, and a testnet bridge. Users can earn points through platform activity that may contribute to future rewards.
profileInfos.tagLine: Multichain made easy. All chains, single app

products.name: Retro Bridge
products.description: RetroBridge transfers digital assets between 41+ blockchain networks through concentrated liquidity pools. It processes transactions in under one minute with a flat fee structure and supports both EVM and non-EVM chains.

products.name: Retro Bridge Advanced Mode
products.description: RetroBridge Advanced Mode allows users to transfer assets from a single source network to multiple destination networks simultaneously. It offers two execution modes: Fast Mode for rapid processing and Sequence Mode with timed intervals.

products.name: Multichain Faucet
products.description: Multichain Faucet distributes testnet tokens across various blockchain networks. Users earn faucet tokens by completing bridge transactions on the main platform, with each successful bridge awarding three tokens that can be used to claim testnet assets.

products.name: Retro Bridge Explorer
products.description: Retro Bridge Explorer displays transaction history and status for bridge transfers across supported networks. It tracks completed and pending transactions, enabling users to monitor the progress of their cross-chain asset movements.

products.name: Retro Bridge API
products.description: Retro Bridge API provides integration tools for applications to access cross-chain bridging functions. It includes public endpoints for basic functionality and partner-specific APIs with custom conditions and monitoring capabilities.

profileInfos.name: Ramp
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Ramp Network provides crypto on-ramp and off-ramp services connecting fiat currencies and digital assets through simple integrations.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Ramp Network offers a non-custodial infrastructure for exchanging digital assets and fiat currencies. Their SDK enables businesses to integrate crypto purchasing and selling capabilities into their applications, with support for multiple payment methods and cryptocurrencies across 150+ countries.
profileInfos.tagLine: Empower users to buy & sell crypto inside your app

products.name: Ramp Network Fiat-Crypto Gateway
products.description: A payment infrastructure that enables both buying cryptocurrencies with fiat (on-ramp) and selling cryptocurrencies back to fiat (off-ramp) through various payment methods. The service is available via a single integration that offers a seamless widget for applications and wallets.

profileInfos.name: Raize Club
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Raize Club helps users earn by predicting real-world events through an on-chain prediction market on Starknet.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Raize Club enables users to predict outcomes on various events including politics, sports, and cryptocurrency prices through an on-chain prediction market. Users can place predictions on binary outcomes, view real-time odds, and receive immediate settlement after event resolution. The platform operates on Starknet, providing transparent verification and low transaction costs. Raize Club makes prediction markets accessible globally without geographic limitations while maintaining fair and verifiable outcomes.
profileInfos.tagLine: Turn Insights into Income

products.name: Raize Club Prediction Market
products.description: Raize Club Prediction Market implements smart contract functionality for creating and settling prediction markets on Starknet. The platform allows position-taking on binary outcomes with real-time probability updates based on user participation. The system processes market creation, position management, and settlement through a factory contract architecture. Market outcomes utilize oracle verification for external data sources while maintaining on-chain transparency for all transactions and results.

profileInfos.name: Radius
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Radius provides economic infrastructure for rollups to capture MEV revenue while safeguarding users from harmful practices.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Radius builds economic infrastructure enabling rollups to generate revenue through MEV capture while protecting users. The platform connects rollups with searchers to identify profitable opportunities like arbitrage and liquidations. With Secure Block Building technology, Radius ensures user transactions remain protected from harmful practices through encryption and cryptographic verification. By transforming MEV into sustainable revenue, Radius helps rollups solve high L1 data costs and transaction fee limitations, creating a foundation for long-term growth in the Ethereum ecosystem.
profileInfos.tagLine: The Economic Growth Engine for Rollups

products.name: Lighthouse
products.description: Lighthouse functions as a decentralized network connecting rollups with searchers to capture MEV opportunities. The system processes MEV bundles from searchers who identify profitable trading strategies across rollups. Lighthouse implements a competitive bidding mechanism for bundle inclusion, enabling rollups to collect fees from executing winning bundles. The network supports multiple MEV strategies including arbitrage, liquidations, and cross-rollup opportunities. By creating revenue beyond transaction fees, Lighthouse provides rollups with a sustainable economic foundation.

products.name: Secure Block Building (SBB)
products.description: Secure Block Building implements cryptographic primitives that protect users from harmful MEV practices during block production. The system encrypts transactions directly in the user's browser with sub-second processing time. SBB utilizes Practical Verifiable Delay Encryption and Single Key Delay Encryption technologies to maintain rollup composability while preventing transaction reordering. The architecture includes slashing mechanisms enforced through native rollup security or shared security protocols. This configuration enables rollups to capture MEV revenue without exposing users to frontrunning or sandwiching attacks.

products.name: Alpha Engine
products.description: Alpha Engine implements a unified growth platform for rollups combining revenue generation, security, and network connectivity solutions. The system integrates Radius, Symbiotic, and Avail technologies to create sustainable economics. Alpha Engine generates revenue through MEV capture, utilizes shared security infrastructure to reduce costs, and facilitates cross-rollup interoperability. The architecture supports multiple rollups simultaneously, creating an interconnected ecosystem with enhanced liquidity flow. By addressing fundamental economic challenges, Alpha Engine provides rollups with essential tools for long-term sustainability and growth.

products.name: Pragma Price Feeds
products.description: Pragma Price Feeds provides verified price data for asset pairs with flexible aggregation methods. The system offers multiple aggregation modes including median, mean, and conversion rate to match specific application needs. Data comes from multiple trusted sources with on-chain validation. The contract implements advanced features like time-weighted average prices, checkpoints, and USD-hop conversions. Price data includes decimals, timestamps, and source counts to ensure accuracy. This feed forms the foundation for DeFi applications requiring reliable price information.

products.name: Pragma Computational Feeds

products.name: Pragma VRF (Verifiable Random Function)
products.description: Pragma VRF implements a Verifiable Random Function using elliptic curve cryptography on Curve25519 to generate tamper-proof randomness for blockchain applications. The implementation follows IETF standards with verification via STARK proofs. The contract processes randomness requests with configurable parameters including seed values, delay periods, and callback functions. Random output verification occurs on-chain with proofs posted as calldata. The system includes retry logic, request cancellation capabilities, and status tracking to ensure randomness delivery even in challenging network conditions.

products.name: Pragma Optimistic Oracle
products.description: A decentralized mechanism that brings off-chain data on-chain using an optimistic verification approach with dispute resolution.

products.name: Pragma Merkle Feeds

profileInfos.name: PixeLAW

The platform enables diverse gaming experiences from simple pixel art to complex interactive games while maintaining full on-chain functionality.

It features implementations in Cairo on Starknet (Dojo) and Solidity on EVM chains (MUD), providing flexibility for developers. Each pixel functions as a programmable unit that responds to predefined game rules and player interactions, enabling diverse applications to share the same pixel grid.

products.description: Flex EVO implements a reward system architecture for Flex Marketplace users, enabling points earning through staking and holding, with upgrade capabilities for farming bonus points. The system processes benefits distribution including zero-fee transactions, special access, and governance rights.

products.name: Flex Launchpad
products.description: Flex Launchpad implements an NFT project launch infrastructure that facilitates fundraising and visibility for creators on Starknet. The system manages minting phases, whitelist allocation, and token distribution through configurable open-edition contracts with multiple metadata support.

profileInfos.name: Force Prime Heroes
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Force Prime Heroes lets you explore maps and build armies in a turn-based strategy game inspired by Heroes of Might and Magic using Starknet blockchain technology.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Force Prime Heroes implements a turn-based strategy game where players command heroes, gather resources, and battle enemies on procedural maps. The system features character progression through four distinct attributes, various unit types, and multiple map objectives. Players compete in tournaments to earn Season Points, with rewards distributed at end of season.
profileInfos.tagLine: Onchain strategy game.

products.name: Force Prime Heroes Game
products.description: Force Prime Heroes implements a turn-based strategy game where players collect resources, recruit units, and engage in battles on procedural maps. The system calculates combat outcomes automatically based on army composition and hero statistics with ranged and melee combat phases.

profileInfos.name: Garaga
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Garaga enables efficient elliptic curve operations and SNARK verification on Starknet through modular arithmetic and non-deterministic techniques.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Garaga provides state-of-the-art elliptic curve tools for Cairo and Starknet, using dedicated builtins for emulated modular arithmetic. It supports scalar multiplication for various curves, pairing operations for BN254 and BLS12_381, and generates Groth16 smart contract verifiers. Developers can efficiently verify zero-knowledge proofs on Starknet with reduced computational steps.
profileInfos.tagLine: State-of-the-art Elliptic Curve operations and SNARKS verification for Cairo & Starknet

products.name: Garaga Elliptic Curve Library
products.description: Garaga implements elliptic curve operations through specialized modular arithmetic circuits compiled to Cairo code. The library supports Groth16 verification for BN254 and BLS12_381 curves while providing a CLI for generating, declaring, deploying, and verifying SNARK verifiers on Starknet. Non-deterministic computation reduces verification step count by up to 60%.

profileInfos.name: Giza
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Giza provides autonomous yield optimization agents for decentralized finance, using smart account architecture and blockchain technology.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Giza develops Web3 agents that automate DeFi strategies, with its flagship product ARMA maximizing stablecoin yields across lending protocols on Base and Mode networks. The platform utilizes smart account architecture, session keys, and protocol integrations to enable secure, non-custodial, automated yield optimization.
profileInfos.tagLine: Streamlining the complexity of web3 through user-centric smart applications.

products.name: ARMA
products.description: ARMA implements autonomous yield optimization through self-custodial smart account architecture that analyzes lending rates across protocols. The system executes automated rebalancing to secure highest returns while managing all associated costs and token conversions. Using session key technology, ARMA maintains security while enabling automated protocol interactions. The architecture includes real-time monitoring, reward token management, and dynamic compounding frequency optimization based on position size, current APR, and transaction costs for maximum efficiency.

profileInfos.name: GokuHub
profileInfos.descriptionShort: GokuHub provides Starknet-native DeFi tools with an account abstraction wallet and decentralized trading features.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: GokuHub delivers Starknet-native DeFi tools, starting with Saiyan Wallet, a Telegram-integrated account abstraction wallet. The platform supports multichain management with focus on Starknet, offering meditation rewards through Ki tokens and sponsored transactions. Future development includes a perpetual DEX, swapping, liquidity provision, and yield farming.
profileInfos.tagLine: The revolutionary DeFi hub, pioneering as the first native perpetuals DEX on Starknet.

products.name: Saiyan Wallet
products.description: Saiyan Wallet implements account abstraction architecture on Starknet, facilitating self-custodial asset management with Telegram integration. The system processes Ki token mining through meditation activities and offers sponsored transactions while maintaining cross-chain compatibility with EVM networks.

products.name: GokuHub Swap
products.description: GokuHub Swap will implement token swapping functions on Starknet, enabling low gas fee trading between assets. The system plans to optimize transaction routing while maintaining MEV protection and composability with other Starknet applications.

products.name: GokuHub Perpetual
products.description: GokuHub Perpetual aims to implement a native perpetual trading protocol on Starknet for cryptocurrency, commodity, and forex market exposure. The system plans to offer leverage functions up to 100x while utilizing Starknet for reduced latency and enhanced transaction throughput.

products.name: GokuHub Pool
products.description: GokuHub Pool will implement liquidity provision functions on Starknet, enabling users to provide assets to trading pools. The system plans to distribute trading fees proportionally to liquidity providers while supporting multiple token pairs and pool configurations.

products.name: GokuHub Farm
products.description: GokuHub Farm will implement yield farming functions on Starknet, allowing users to stake LP tokens for additional incentives. The system plans to offer variable rewards based on farm allocations while supporting multiple farming strategies and token pairs.

assets.name: Ki Token
assets.description: Ki functions as the utility token for Saiyan Wallet, implementing reward distribution and sponsored transaction mechanisms.

profileInfos.name: Herodotus
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Herodotus provides data access middleware that enables blockchain applications to verify and access cross-chain data using cryptographic proofs.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Herodotus builds zero-knowledge infrastructure for blockchains focusing on three core solutions. The platform provides verifiable data access across different blockchain layers, offers verifiable compute capabilities for processing chain data with cryptographic integrity, and develops scaling solutions for enhanced blockchain performance. These technologies enable trustless cross-chain applications without intermediaries.
profileInfos.tagLine: ZK Infrastructure for Blockchains: Verify, Compute, Scale

products.name: Herodotus Storage Proofs
products.description: Storage Proofs implements cryptographic inclusion proofs combined with computation validation mechanisms to attest data validity across blockchain networks. The system verifies data presence within cryptographic structures while authenticating transformations applied to that data, enabling secure cross-chain data access without third-party trust.

products.name: Herodotus Storage Proof API
products.description: Storage Proof API provides developers with programmatic access to generate and verify storage proofs within applications. The API abstracts cryptographic complexity and integrates storage proof validation logic through a well-defined interface, allowing applications to implement cross-chain data verification without specialized knowledge of proof systems.

products.name: Herodotus Turbo
products.description: Turbo implements a smart contract interface for generating storage proofs through specialized RPC endpoints. The system enables synchronous transactions with automated proof generation, allowing developers to access cross-chain data through simple function calls without managing the underlying cryptographic proof generation process.

products.name: Herodotus Data Processor
products.description: Herodotus Data Processor implements a framework for defining data sets and executing verifiable computations over blockchain data. The system uses STARK proofs and storage proofs to validate computation correctness, enabling applications to perform complex data processing while maintaining cryptographic integrity across blockchain networks.

products.name: Herodotus Integrity Verifier
products.description: Integrity Verifier implements STARK proof verification directly on Starknet for Layer 3 scalability. The system enables efficient validation of cryptographic proofs within the Starknet ecosystem, allowing developers to build advanced trust-minimized applications with enhanced verification capabilities on the network.

products.name: Herodotus Sequencer-to-Sequencer
products.description: Sequencer-to-Sequencer implements a framework for horizontal scaling of app-chains for rapid data access between Ethereum rollups. The system utilizes storage proofs and specialized data processing for direct off-chain communication between sequencers, reducing latency while maintaining security for applications requiring frequent cross-chain interactions.

profileInfos.name: Horus Labs
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Horus Labs develops user-friendly web3 tools for Starknet that simplify blockchain interaction and bridge the gap between on-chain technology and users.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Horus Labs creates developer-focused tools and protocols for the Starknet ecosystem. Their products include Token Bound Accounts for NFT functionality enhancement, Starknet Scaffold for simplified dApp development, and Coloniz for community building. Each solution addresses specific technical challenges while maintaining accessibility and user experience.
profileInfos.tagLine: Bunch of misfits with skill issues.

products.name: Coloniz
products.description: A framework for creating customized, AI-enhanced communities with personalized experiences and automated support based on community discussions.

products.name: Token Bound Accounts (TBA)
products.description: A suite of open-source tools that implement the SNIP-14 standard on Starknet, allowing NFTs to function as smart wallets that can hold assets and interact with dApps.

profileInfos.name: Lambda Class
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Lambda builds cryptographic and blockchain solutions using zero-knowledge proofs, focusing on Rust implementations of critical infrastructure for secure and scalable blockchain systems.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Lambda is a deep tech venture studio working at the intersection of research and engineering, specialized in developing cryptographic tools and blockchain infrastructure. Their focus includes zero-knowledge proofs, Starknet infrastructure, Cairo VM implementation, and computational integrity. Lambda's tools enable developers to build secure, efficient, and trustless blockchain applications with minimal technical barriers.
profileInfos.tagLine: LambdaClass is a venture studio that works on difficult problems related to distributed systems, ML, compilers and cryptography.

products.name: Lambdaworks
products.description: Lambdaworks implements cryptographic primitives used to build proof systems like SNARKs and STARKs, with comprehensive backends for various proving systems, field extensions, and compatibility with different frontends.

products.name: Cairo-VM
products.description: Cairo-VM is a Rust implementation of the Cairo virtual machine, supporting the execution of Cairo programs that can generate proofs of execution. It provides significant performance improvements over the original Python implementation.

products.name: STARK Platinum
products.description: A Rust implementation of the STARK proving system, compatible with Starknet's Stone prover. It enables the creation of zero-knowledge proofs of computational integrity with high performance.

products.name: Cairo Native
products.description: A compiler that converts Cairo's Sierra code to machine code via MLIR and LLVM, enabling much faster execution of Cairo programs through native compilation.

products.name: Ergodic Fund
products.description: Investment fund that invests in companies across the deep tech sector at the pre-seed or seed stages, with a focus on blockchain technology and research.

profileInfos.name: Kakarot
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Kakarot implements a ZK proving engine for the Ethereum Virtual Machine enabling trust-minimized, scalable state verification using STARK technology.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Kakarot provides zero-knowledge proving infrastructure for EVM-compatible blockchains, allowing any chain to transition to ZK for improved security and scalability. Built on CairoVM, it implements provable EVM execution that works across Ethereum L1, rollups, and Bitcoin sidechains. The system generates ZK proofs of block execution, enabling efficient state verification and cross-chain interoperability.
profileInfos.tagLine: We are building a ZK proving engine for the EVM , radically changing digital data verification.

products.name: Keth
products.description: Keth implements chain-agnostic EVM proving that generates ZK proofs of EVM block execution in real-time. The system can help optimistic rollups transition to ZK, reinforce existing ZK-rollups with multiple proof systems, and power ZK-bridges for cross-chain interoperability, all while leveraging Starkware's STARK technology for efficient proof generation.

products.name: Kakarot on Bitcoin
products.description: Kakarot on Bitcoin enables Ethereum-compatible ZK-rollups secured by Bitcoin using OP_CAT and other opcodes. It allows the verification of ZK proofs directly on Bitcoin, enabling trust-minimized bridging of BTC to rollups and unlocking native DeFi capabilities while maintaining Bitcoin's security guarantees.

products.name: Kakarot zkEVM
products.description: Kakarot implements a complete EVM in Cairo, enabling existing Solidity smart contracts to run on Starknet. The system combines STARK-based cryptography with full EVM compatibility, allowing developers to deploy and execute Ethereum applications within Starknet's high-performance environment while maintaining code compatibility.

profileInfos.name: Kaito

profileInfos.descriptionLong: Kaito indexes a wide range of Web3 content not accessible through traditional search engines, including social media, governance forums, research, news, podcasts, and conference transcripts. Using advanced AI technologies, Kaito transforms unstructured data into structured insights for investment, marketing, and growth teams across the Web3 ecosystem.

profileInfos.descriptionLong: Hypernative monitors blockchain activity to detect and block threats through real-time analysis. The platform identifies over 200 risk types including contract exploits, frontend compromises, and private key theft. With automated protective actions including pausing contracts and moving funds, Hypernative helps protocols, asset managers, and exchanges maintain operations during attack attempts while safeguarding digital assets.

The system evaluates transaction patterns, contract executions, and mempool data to detect exploits, then triggers automated protective actions according to predefined security policies.

products.description: Implements transaction-level policy enforcement through an onchain contract that queries addresses for risk factors. The contract validates transaction sources and execution patterns against security rules, enabling protocols to block malicious interactions while maintaining service for legitimate users.

products.description: Implements address risk evaluation through a database of addresses flagged for security concerns. The system monitors wallet addresses for sanctioned status, exploit involvement,

profileInfos.name: Kulipa

profileInfos.descriptionLong: Kulipa is a platform that enables crypto wallets to issue branded payment cards, allowing users to spend their digital assets with merchants. Users can make transactions using stablecoins, integrate their wallets with Apple Pay and Google Pay, and manage their card usage through an admin dashboard. The platform simplifies payment processing by handling compliance and third-party integrations, making it easier for wallets to offer card-based transactions.

Supporting multiple blockchains, the platform enables end-users to spend stablecoins directly from self-custodial wallets without off-ramping. The system features zero-knowledge technology for secure, low-cost transactions, and includes Apple Pay and Google Pay integration for mobile payments.

profileInfos.name: Fuzzing Labs
profileInfos.descriptionShort: FuzzingLabs is a security company that helps identify software vulnerabilities through research, testing, and training.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: FuzzingLabs is a security company that specializes in identifying software vulnerabilities. Users can conduct security assessments, develop secure software, and improve their skills through hands-on training. The platform focuses on strengthening blockchain, AI/ML, and software security by offering customized solutions and educational resources.
profileInfos.tagLine: Advanced Cybersecurity Solutions

products.name: Thoth
products.description: Thoth functions as a security toolkit for Cairo and Starknet, providing bytecode analysis, disassembly, and decompilation capabilities for smart contract review. The tool enables security teams to inspect low-level code execution and identify potential vulnerabilities in deployed contracts.

products.name: Cairo-fuzzer
products.description: Cairo-fuzzer implements automated testing techniques for Cairo and Starknet smart contracts, identifying edge cases and security vulnerabilities. The system uses input mutation to generate test cases, allowing developers to discover potential exploits during development rather than after deployment.

products.name: Web3 OSINT Platform
products.description: The Web3 OSINT Platform analyzes blockchain transactions to track and investigate cryptocurrency movements across multiple networks. The system implements forensic techniques for digital asset tracking, enabling investigators to identify patterns and relationships between wallets and transactions.

products.name: Telecom Fuzzer
products.description: The Telecom Fuzzer tests 4G/VoLTE/5G network components for security vulnerabilities through systematic protocol manipulation. The system supports multiple telecom protocols including GTP, NGAP, PFCP, and HTTP/2, identifying potential exploits in network infrastructure before deployment.

products.name: Octopus
products.description: Octopus performs security analysis on WebAssembly modules and blockchain smart contracts across multiple platforms including Bitcoin, Ethereum, NEO, and EOS. The tool enables comprehensive code inspection for vulnerability detection and contract verification.

products.name: WARF
products.description: WARF tests WebAssembly runtimes for security issues through automated fuzzing techniques. The tool focuses on improving resilience in WebAssembly virtual machines, parsers, and execution environments by systematically identifying edge cases and unexpected inputs.

products.name: Sui-fuzzer
products.description: Sui-fuzzer implements automated testing for Sui blockchain smart contracts, detecting security vulnerabilities through input manipulation techniques. The system tests contract execution paths systematically, providing developers with insights into edge cases and potential security flaws before deployment to the Sui network.

profileInfos.name: Artemis

profileInfos.descriptionLong: Artemis builds digital asset analytics tools that compile fundamental on-chain metrics into accessible formats. The platform delivers blockchain data through multiple interfaces including dashboards, spreadsheet plugins, APIs, and Snowflake data sharing. Analysts and organizations use Artemis to analyze metrics across chains and applications, compare performance, and make data-driven decisions without coding requirements.
profileInfos.tagLine: Data Standard for â€â€Digital Finance

The platform automates the import of transactions from more than 1,000 sources and allows users to import transactions seamlessly, track activities, and generate audit-ready tax reports.

products.name: Crypto Tax Calculator
products.description: Crypto Tax Calculator simplifies crypto tax reporting by automating transaction imports and generating CPA-approved tax reports.

The software categorizes transactions for staking, swaps, liquidity providing, and NFTs. Users receive tax summaries and downloadable reports for filing with tax authorities.

products.description: The software processes crypto transactions from multiple blockchains and exchanges to generate tax reports. It automatically categorizes activities including swaps, staking, and NFT transactions. Users connect wallets for real-time transaction analysis and receive downloadable tax forms compatible with tax filing platforms.

profileInfos.name: Relend Network
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Relend Network provides stablecoin liquidity for L2 ecosystems through rUSDC, a stablecoin redeemable 1:1 for USDC on Ethereum.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Relend Network addresses stablecoin liquidity challenges across Layer 2 networks through a unique approach to multi-L2 CDP-based stablecoins. The platform generates rUSDC instances for each blockchain, backed by lending market collateral and USDC. Users mint rUSDC by supplying USDC on Ethereum mainnet or with approved collateral, maintaining 1:1 redemption capacity. This increases total value locked in DeFi markets while reducing cross-chain risks.
profileInfos.tagLine: Relending Money Market Liquidity to L1s and L2s.

products.name: Relend Vaults
products.description: Relend Vaults integrate with Morpho protocol to generate yields from deposited assets in pre-deposit contracts. Vaults accept various assets including USDC, ETH, cbBTC, and others, providing yield through lending to over-collateralized borrowers. Assets in these vaults contribute to the Global Price Stability Module used to maintain rUSDC liquidity and redemption capacity.

products.name: Relend Stablecoin Issuance (rUSDC)
products.description: rUSDC implements ERC-7770 token standard for creating chain-specific stablecoins with 1:1 USDC redemption capability. The protocol maintains distinct Local Price Stability Modules for each instance, with a Global PSM to handle redemption demands. This architecture enables localized stablecoin issuance with independent risk management while maintaining system-wide stability.

assets.name: Relend Network USDC - Starknet
assets.description: rUSDC-stark functions as a Starknet-native stablecoin token redeemable 1:1 for USDC on Ethereum, enabling lending markets and liquidity for Starknet DeFi applications.

assets.description: RELEND Units serve as pre-launch incentives that track user participation in the protocol's pre-deposit vaults and community activities.

profileInfos.name: Remus

profileInfos.descriptionLong: Remus offers a decentralized exchange offering a transparent orderbook trading experience on Starknet. It features multiple market pairs, on-chain matching with price-time priority, and diverse order types including IOC, Post, and Basic. The platform leverages Starknet's high throughput to handle increased trading volume with limit orders and on-chain settlement.
profileInfos.tagLine: Trade like a legend

products.name: RemusDEX

The system matches buy and sell orders with price-time priority, executes trades with multiple order types including IOC and Post, and maintains user funds in claimable balances until explicit withdrawal is requested.

profileInfos.name: Budokan
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Budokan implements a fully onchain tournament platform for blockchain games, enabling token-agnostic entries, configurable prize distributions, and multi-game tournaments.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Budokan provides a tournament infrastructure for blockchain games with flexible configuration options. Game developers can offload tournament management while gaining features including token-agnostic entry fees, customizable prize distributions, and sponsorship capabilities. The platform enables both single-game tournaments with fixed registration or seasonal structures and complex multi-round, multi-game tournaments through its Embeddable Game Standard.
profileInfos.tagLine: A fully onchain tournament platform.

products.name: Budokan
products.description: Budokan implements an onchain tournament infrastructure using smart contracts on Starknet. The protocol processes registration, leaderboard tracking, and prize distribution for blockchain games. It offers configurable registration periods, customizable prize structures, and integration with existing game tokens through uniform interfaces and standardized APIs.

profileInfos.name: StarkCrash
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Starkcrash lets you place bets on rising multipliers in a provably fair crash game built on Starknet's fast and secure blockchain.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Starkcrash implements a provably fair crash gambling game on Starknet. Players bet on an increasing multiplier graph, deciding when to cash out to secure their winnings. The longer a player waits, the higher the potential reward, but if they wait too long and the game crashes, they lose their bet. The platform uses transparent seed hashing and verification to ensure fairness, allowing players to verify each game outcome. With a simple interface and straightforward mechanics, Starkcrash offers an accessible gambling experience on Starknet.
profileInfos.tagLine: Place your bets, watch the multiplier rise, and cash out before it's too late!

products.name: Starkcrash Game
products.description: Starkcrash implements a provably fair crash game through seed-based randomness generation, executing multiplier calculations with verifiable outcomes. The system computes crash points using a house edge algorithm while maintaining transparency through public seed verification. The technical implementation allows players to verify the fairness of each round by checking the relationship between the seed, its hash, and the resulting multiplier. The platform processes bets and payouts through Starknet smart contracts, leveraging the blockchain's speed and security.

profileInfos.name: Fundable
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Fundable provides automated cryptocurrency payment solutions with support for subscriptions, giveaways, salaries, and SIPs on Starknet.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Fundable enables efficient cryptocurrency payment processing on Starknet with features for linear streaming, quadratic funding, and mass distribution. The platform allows users to create payment streams with per-second rates, distribute resources through transparent giveaway mechanisms, and perform mass payouts with transaction batching that reduces gas fees by up to 90%.
profileInfos.tagLine: Refining automated payments in Web3

products.name: Fundable
products.description: Fundable implements a payment infrastructure focused on recurring and batch cryptocurrency transactions on Starknet. The system processes linear streaming payments with per-second precision, manages quadratic funding allocations to amplify community preferences, and enables mass distributions through transaction batching. The platform provides tools for importing payment details, selecting distribution methods, and tracking real-time accounting.

profileInfos.descriptionLong: Custos Diretriz implements blockchain protocols for secure evidence storage and legal agreement management.
