products.description: Lumos DeFi Calculator implements analytical algorithms through real-time data processing, enabling performance forecasting for concentrated liquidity positions. The system computes impermanent loss metrics while incorporating protocol-specific parameters for accurate yield estimation. The architecture supports multi-protocol integration with Starknet-based platforms through standardized data normalization techniques. Users can visualize position performance across different price ranges and compare strategies with customizable parameters.

profileInfos.name: PonziLand
profileInfos.descriptionShort: PonziLand lets you buy and manage virtual land with any ERC-20 token in a fully on-chain economic simulation.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: PonziLand is a blockchain game where players compete in economic battles over virtual land. Players buy plots, set selling prices, and place tax deposits. Each block, taxes are collected and distributed to neighbors, challenging players to price land correctly. Too high a price risks stagnation, too low means quick turnover with minimal profit. Features include land upgrades, auctions, and a nuke mechanism to reset inactive plots.
profileInfos.tagLine: Get rugged

products.name: PonziLand
products.description: A fully on-chain implementation of a land ownership system using DeFi mechanics. Players buy, sell, and collect taxes from neighboring land, creating a dynamic economic simulation. The system supports any ERC-20 token through a token-agnostic design, allowing players to use different tokens for land purchases and staking.

assets.name: Land NFT
assets.description: NFT representing virtual land in PonziLand's economic game system, earns taxes from neighboring lands based on their token deposits.

profileInfos.name: Cartridge
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Cartridge provides tools for building, deploying, and scaling on-chain games on Starknet blockchain with seamless player onboarding.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Cartridge delivers a comprehensive infrastructure for blockchain gaming with three main products: Dojo for game development, Controller for player onboarding and authentication, and Slot for scaling game performance. The platform enables developers to create fully on-chain games with high performance, low latency, and affordable computation while supporting features like Passkeys, Session Tokens, and execution sharding.
profileInfos.tagLine: High Performance Infrastructure for Decentralized Gaming

products.name: Slot
products.description: Slot provides horizontally scalable execution sharding for blockchain gaming, delivering low-latency contexts with fixed computational costs. The system processes game-specific transactions independently while maintaining provability and settlement with the parent blockchain.

products.name: Controller
products.description: Controller implements a self-custodial embedded wallet for Starknet, enabling secure account provisioning through Passkeys and gameplay optimization with session keys. The system maintains secure signing mechanisms while abstracting blockchain complexities from players.

profileInfos.name: SwarmZero
profileInfos.descriptionShort: SwarmZero provides a platform for building, deploying, and monetizing AI agents with blockchain integration capabilities.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: SwarmZero enables developers to create and monetize AI agents on a marketplace platform. Users can build agents that automate complex tasks, from blockchain data analysis to smart contract evaluation. The platform supports swarm functionality where multiple agents work together on tasks such as Web3 dApp development.
profileInfos.tagLine: Empower your team with virtual AI colleagues.

products.name: SwarmZero Platform
products.description: SwarmZero implements a multi-agent platform with integrated marketplace for AI agents. The system enables creation, deployment, monetization, and discovery of agents through a unified interface. The platform utilizes language models to power agents that perform tasks from code generation to blockchain analytics, while facilitating transactions between agent builders and consumers.

products.name: SwarmZero SDK
products.description: SwarmZero SDK provides programmatic interfaces for building AI agents and agent swarms. The system implements Python-based frameworks enabling custom agent creation, API connections, and multi-agent workflow orchestration.

profileInfos.name: Daydreams
profileInfos.descriptionShort: A generative crosschain agent framework for creating autonomous AI agents that execute tasks across blockchain networks and APIs.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Daydreams provides a framework for building autonomous AI agents capable of executing complex tasks across multiple blockchains and APIs. The system enables dynamic problem-solving with hierarchical task networks, persistent memory, and collective learning through agent swarms. Primarily used for onchain gaming, DeFi operations, and smart contract interactions, Daydreams allows agents to develop goal-oriented behavior and adapt to new situations.
profileInfos.tagLine: Daydreams is a generative crosschain agent framework for executing anything onchain.

products.name: Daydreams Framework
products.description: A TypeScript library that implements generative agent architecture for blockchain interactions. The framework uses hierarchical task networks that dynamically update as agents pursue goals, supporting cross-chain operations with memory systems based on vector embeddings. Integrated with multiple LLM providers, the system enables agents to execute transactions and interact with smart contracts autonomously.

assets.name: Daydreams
assets.description: Functions as the utility token for the Daydreams ecosystem, facilitating governance and developer incentives across the generative agent platform.

profileInfos.name: SonarX
profileInfos.descriptionShort: SonarX helps you access blockchain data by providing comprehensive indexed data across 100+ chains.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: SonarX helps institutions and blockchain companies access high-quality on-chain data by providing comprehensive indexed data with industry-leading chain coverage. With it, you can analyze real-time blockchain activity, access historical data, and integrate multi-chain data feeds. SonarX ensures data quality through systematic validation and completeness checks.
profileInfos.tagLine: The One-Stop-Shop for Indexed On-Chain Data

products.name: SonarX Real-Time
products.description: SonarX Real-Time is a blockchain data service providing indexed on-chain data with seconds from tip latency across 100+ chains. The product offers instant indexing and delivers data through warehouses for SQL querying without storage costs. Used for trading models, fraud detection, network monitoring, risk assessment, and DApp analytics.

products.name: SonarX Complete Historical Streaming
products.description: SonarX Complete Historical Streaming is a blockchain data service providing complete indexed data from the genesis block to near real-time across 100+ chains. The product delivers data through Snowflake, BigQuery, DataBricks, and Parquet files with automated quality controls for data integrity.

profileInfos.name: Velix
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Velix helps users earn staking rewards while maintaining liquidity by providing liquid staking derivatives across multiple blockchains.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Velix helps DeFi users earn staking rewards on multiple blockchain networks by providing liquid staking derivatives. With it, you can stake native tokens to receive liquid derivatives, continue participating in DeFi activities, and earn additional rewards through VePoints. Velix reduces liquidity fragmentation in the blockchain ecosystem while maintaining no lock-up periods.
profileInfos.tagLine: Stake your native token, Earn rewards.

products.name: Velix Liquid Staking
products.description: Velix Liquid Staking implements node staking through liquid staking derivatives, enabling users to stake native tokens while maintaining liquidity. The system captures MEV profits and provides auto-compounding rewards while allowing simultaneous DeFi participation.

assets.name: veSTRK
assets.description: veSTRK functions as liquid staking token for Starknet network, enabling staking rewards accrual while maintaining liquidity and DeFi participation.

assets.name: VELIX
assets.description: VELIX functions as governance token for Velix Protocol, enabling community voting on protocol decisions and future direction.

assets.name: VePoints
assets.description: VePoints implements a loyalty program through point accumulation, enabling users to earn redeemable rewards for staking and referrals. The system incentivizes protocol participation while offering boosted earnings for liquidity provision and governance activities.

assets.name: veMetis
assets.description: veMetis functions as liquid staking token for Metis network, enabling staking rewards accrual while maintaining liquidity and DeFi participation.

profileInfos.name: Kasar Labs
profileInfos.descriptionShort: KasarLabs provides Starknet infrastructure and developer tools through secure node clients, AI agents, and specialized hardware.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: KasarLabs builds critical Starknet infrastructure and developer tools as core developers of the ecosystem. The company creates Rust-based node clients, AI agent frameworks, hardware nodes, and testing tools that enhance blockchain accessibility and development efficiency in the Starknet ecosystem.
profileInfos.tagLine: An engineering and research laboratory of Starknet  core devs solving your high and low-level problems.

products.name: Snak
products.description: Snak implements an AI agent framework through langchain integration, enabling blockchain interactions and autonomous task execution. The system supports multiple AI providers while providing Starknet-specific capabilities for developers.

profileInfos.name: Atomiq Exchange
profileInfos.descriptionShort: Atomiq Exchange provides trustless cross-chain swaps between Bitcoin and L2 networks through atomic execution and blockchain-based security.
profileInfos.descriptionLong: Atomiq Exchange enables users to swap assets between Bitcoin and Layer 2 networks using Bitcoin light clients and atomic execution protocols. The system implements submarine swaps for Lightning Network and proof-time locked contracts for on-chain transactions, eliminating counterparty risk and trust requirements while maintaining security through Bitcoin's proof-of-work.
profileInfos.tagLine: Fully trustless, zero slippage swaps between native Bitcoin (on-chain & lightning) & Solana + Bitcoin & Starknet secured by Bitcoin's proof

products.name: Atomiq DEX
products.description: Atomiq DEX implements cross-chain swaps between Bitcoin and Layer 2 networks through Bitcoin light client verification, submarine swaps, and proof-time locked contracts. The system processes transactions via a permissionless network of liquidity providers using a request-for-quote model, while maintaining security through on-chain escrow and proof-of-work validation.
